column15:
As a Data Analyst/Engineer, you are in charge Revenue Operations & data activities at Toucan.
You will work closely with our CEO and CFO, collaborate with team leaders and c-level on strategic ops and data projects which help our organisation to become more data-driven.

This role is needed to drive company OKRs execution and maximize business teams efficiency

  • Design and optimize business processes and enable team alignment

  • Facilitate communication and collaboration among sales, marketing, customer success teams and product to optimize customer experience and revenue growth.

  • Contribute to manage and maintain Sales & Marketing stack

  • Design and implement scalable and robust data architecture and infrastructure to support the organization‚Äôs data needs.

  • Oversee the ingestion, modeling and integration of data from multiple sources, ensuring accuracy, completeness, and consistency.

  • Define data governance frameworks, policies, and procedures to ensure data quality, security, and compliance.

  • Encourage stakeholders to take decisions, drive business and processes using BI applications & analysis

DATA STACK

  • Ingestion: Stitch, Airbyte, Airflow (Python)

  • Transformation: DBT

  • Data warehouse: BigQuery

  • ‚Ä¶. and Toucan Toco (obviously üôÇ)

SALES & MARKETING STACK

  • CRM: Salesforce

  • Marketing Automation: Hubspot

  • Cadencing & Outbound : LinkedIn Sales Nav, Cognism, Salesloft

YOUR BENEFITS

  • You arrive at the right time to take your place in a Growing organization and have an impact

  • You integrate a team of software developers, designers, sales people and PMs.

  • You‚Äôre autonomous, your initiative moves are greatly encouraged .

  • You set up a Must Have SaaS: Companies needs Analytics more than ever

ATMOSPHERE

  • An atmosphere Welcoming, Healthy and Simple.

  • Team collaboration is not a false promise but a reality

column15:
At Sorare, we bet on passionate and innovative people! Are you looking for an empowering environment to grow professionally and personally? Join us in this tremendous adventure!

Our Mission

Sorare is a fantasy sports gaming experience and marketplace featuring officially licensed digital player cards. With Sorare you build legacy teams ‚Äì¬† buying, selling, collecting and trading player cards -- and compete with them in free-to-play fantasy games to win rewards week over week and season over season, just like a professional sports owner.

Sorare is revolutionizing digital sports fandom, and now has over 3,5 million users across 180 countries. More than 300 iconic teams, clubs, and organizations including the Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga, Serie A, MLS, NBA, NBPA, MLB, MLBPA, and many others have partnered with Sorare to build the next sports entertainment giant.

Our Journey

Sorare was founded by Nicolas Julia and Adrien Montfort in 2018 in Paris to bring sports fans across the globe closer to the players, teams, and leagues they love.

With 130-plus employees across France and US, Sorare is one of Europe‚Äôs fastest-growing startups and recently raised a $680 million Series B funding round from world-class investors including SoftBank, Accel, and Benchmark. Sorare also has athletes Serena Williams, Zinedine Zidane, Rio Ferdinand, Antoine Griezmann, Gerard Piqu√©, Blake Griffin, and Rudy Gobert among its investors, ambassadors, and advisors.

Our Values

  • Own your game: Think and act like an owner, and expect your teammates to do the same. You are an ‚Äúentrepreneur‚Äù empowered to make decisions and own the outcomes.

  • Build with the fans, and for the fans: Have an obsession for high-quality user experiences. Engage our community with transparency to build trust and learn from the fans to deliver effective changes.

  • Run fast: Take bold risks and outpace the competition in an ever changing environment. Have a bias for action (connected to team goals) and strive to ship and iterate.

  • Have fun and bring joy: Sports have the power to unite people around the world, and as fans ourselves, we believe it is a privilege to work in this industry.

  • Win as a team: We are all in this together as one team, win or lose. Inspire your teammates to always be better.

What we're looking for

As the leader of Data at Sorare, you will play a crucial role in building Sorare‚Äôs Data Analytics organization. You will work closely with the executive team to enable and empower a data-first culture, elevating Sorare‚Äôs approach to data.

Sorare is looking for a senior data leader who will lead data organization and partner with engineering, product, finance and other cross-functional teams to answer key questions about how to grow revenue, scale the business, and launch high-impact initiatives and product development. You will advise the company‚Äôs most critical quantitative projects and achieve its most strategic business and product goals. You will act as the most senior data leader at Sorare reporting directly to the CTO and will be responsible for implementing the data culture and strategy for the business.

Responsibilities

  • Manage, attract, hire a world class team of data analysts

  • Develop strong cross-functional partnerships and facilitate data-driven decision making across the organization

  • Lead a team to partner with engineering, product, design and other organizations to frame problems, both mathematically and within the Sorare business context

  • Collaborate with other leaders and executives to build and set data-informed business strategy and build product roadmaps

Requirements

  • M.S. or Ph.D in qualitative disciplines such as Statistics, Applied Mathematics, Economics, Operations Research, Computer Science, Engineering or a related quantitative field

  • 6+ years of experience within data organizations

  • 2+ years of leading/managing experience

  • Ability to lead and inspire a team who converts complex datasets into digestible business and product insights

  • Ability to influence prioritization and execution of high impact projects affecting the customer experience and monetization

  • Experience building out data environments from the ground up

  • Strong attention to detail and project management skills

  • Excellent written and verbal communication

Our Hiring Process

  • Step 1: Recruiter Screen (30 min)

  • Step 2: Hiring Manager Screen

  • Step 3: Case Study + Panel interviews

  • Step 4: Reference Check & Offer

Sorare is an equal opportunity employer committed to an inclusive and diverse workplace. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to: race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran status, disability status, or any other basis prohibited by law.

As we are an international company, please note we speak English in the workplace. Please apply for the role with an English CV so we can process your application.

column38:
Sorare is at the intersection of sports, gaming and NFTs. Through tradable digital cards, Sorare is designing a collective fantasy sport experience where you can manage your favorite Football, Baseball and Basketball players, hone your passion to earn prizes and be part of a community. Anyone, anywhere, can connect with the game on Sorare. The company‚Äôs mission is to build ‚Äúthe game within the game‚Äù and to give fans, players and clubs the platform to celebrate, share and own the game.

Founded in 2018, Sorare has seen tremendous growth. The platform had a card sales volume of over $300M (‚Ç¨270M) since January 2021 across 160 countries. Sorare is backed by a world-class team of investors including Softbank, Benchmark, Accel Partners, footballers such as Gerard Piqu√©, Antoine Griezmann and Rio Ferdinand, and key tech investors such as Alexis Ohanian.

column15:
Our mission? Making day-to-day banking easier for SMEs and freelancers thanks to an online business account that's combined with invoicing, bookkeeping and spend management tools. Thanks to its innovative product, highly reactive 24/7 customer support and clear pricing, Qonto has become the leader in its market.


Our journey: Founded by Alexandre¬†and¬†Steve in July 2017, Qonto has rapidly gained trust, serving over 500,000 customers. Thanks to our wonderful team of 1,600+ Qontoers, we also made it to the LinkedIn Top Companies French ranking!


Our values:

Customer focus | Prioritize customers in everything you do

Ownership | Own your part, get things done

Teamwork | Make (team)work easy

Mastery | Continuously raise the bar

Integrity | Always do what‚Äôs right, and respect people


Our beliefs: At Qonto, we're committed to fostering a welcoming environment where everyone can thrive. We prioritize evaluating applicants based solely on skills and potential, ensuring diversity with 50% international team members, 44% women, and 20% parents. Join us in building a workplace that celebrates diversity and individuality.


Discover the steps we took to create a discrimination-free hiring process.


At Qonto our Data department can proudly count¬†more than 59 people, of whom 25 belong to the BI Data Analyst Team.

Our highly skilled Data Analysts deliver high-quality products in a fast-paced environment with strong ownership while managing our ever-growing user base needs


Our Data analysts are real Business partners and are strongly connected with every department as they actively collaborate with them (Product, Growth, People, Finance, Ops, Website‚Ä¶) and have a strong impact on building new strategies for the company.


üéØ Mission: Join us as a Data Analyst Team Lead to enhance our reporting and analytical capabilities and drive high-stakes decision-making processes. You will play a pivotal role in developing robust dashboards and delivering accurate, detailed ad-hoc analyses to our top-tier stakeholders.


üë©‚Äçüíªüßë‚Äçüíª As a Data Analyst Team Lead at Qonto, you will:

- Develop and maintain critical dashboards that drive strategic decisions,

- Supervise ad-hoc analyses to provide insights on trends and outliers,

- Ensure the highest data quality through top-notch KPI governance,

- Lead and mentored a growing team of Data Analysts, fostering a culture of meticulous attention to detail and rigorous quality,

- Collaborate closely with C-levels, providing actionable insights that influence major decisions.


ü§î What you can expect:

Team Environment: You'll join a robust team of experts in a supportive and learning-focused environment, ideal for professional growth.

High Impact: Your work will directly influence major company decisions,

Growth Opportunities: At Qonto, career progression is not just a possibility‚Äîit's a priority. Whether it's expanding your scope, diving deeper into complex projects, or transitioning roles within the organization, we support your career aspirations.

Stakeholder Interaction: Engage with high-level executives and contribute directly to strategic planning and execution.

Tools and Methodologies: Utilize cutting-edge tools and methodologies to deliver precise and impactful insights.


ü§ù About your future manager: Your direct supervisor will be Erwan Croguennoc, the incoming Head of BI. Erwan's management style is grounded in support and guidance, rather than micromanagement, providing you with the autonomy to innovate and the support to succeed.


üèÖ About You:

Experience: Proven track record as a Data Analyst or similar role, with experience in leading teams, even if on a small scale.

Skill in Detail-Oriented Analysis: Exceptional attention to detail and a commitment to delivering flawless quality, crucial in high-stakes environments.

Communication: Strong ability to explain complex data in a clear and impactful manner to stakeholders at all levels.

Leadership: While extensive management experience is not required, an aptitude for mentoring and guiding teams is essential.

Adaptability: Comfortable working under stringent deadlines and capable of handling the pressures of critical financial reporting periods.


At Qonto we understand that true diversity isn't just about ticking boxes on a hiring checklist. Apply regardless of the boxes you tick! Who knows? You may have the missing piece of the puzzle we've been searching for all along.

üéÅ Perks


A tailor-made and dynamic career track. An inclusive work environment. And so much more to help you succeed.


- Offices in Paris, Berlin, Milan, Barcelona, and Belgrade;

- Tailor-made remote work policy depending on the job you apply for and where you live;

- Competitive salary package;

- A¬†meal voucher;

- Public transportation reimbursement (part or global);

- A great health insurance (depending on the country);

- Employee well-being initiatives: access to Moka Care¬†to take care of your mental health and great offers for sports and wellness activities;

- A progressive disability, and parenthood policy as part of our commitment to the¬†Parental Act¬†(1 in 6 of Qonto employees is a parent!) and childcare benefits with selected partners;

- Monthly team events.


üí™ Our hiring process:


- Interviews with your Talent Acquisition Manager and future managers

- A remote exercise to demonstrate your skills and give you a taste of what working at Qonto could be like


We will send you an interview guide so you can best prepare yourself.

On average, our process lasts 20 working days and offers usually follow within 48 hours ü§û



To learn more about us:

Qonto's Blog¬†|¬†Les √âchos I L'Usine Digitale |¬†Courrier Cadres



To know how your personal data will be processed during your application process or to request its deletion, please¬†click here.
column38:
Their mission:

We want to make day-to-day banking easier for SMEs and freelancers thanks to an online business account that‚Äôs combined with invoicing, bookkeeping and spend management tools. By harnessing technology and design. And by offering fair and transparent pricing.

At Qonto, we‚Äôre passionate about creating the best product - with both impact and a great user experience. So if you‚Äôre looking for an ambitious team that‚Äôs revolutionizing a rather old-fashioned industry, get in touch. You can find out more about the¬†Qonto Way¬†here.

Alexandre¬†and¬†Steve¬†launched Qonto in July 2017. Since then, the team has made great strides:

column15:
Our mission? Making day-to-day banking easier for SMEs and freelancers thanks to an online business account that's combined with invoicing, bookkeeping and spend management tools. Thanks to its innovative product, highly reactive 24/7 customer support and clear pricing, Qonto has become the leader in its market.


Our journey: Founded by Alexandre¬†and¬†Steve in July 2017, Qonto has rapidly gained trust, serving over 500,000 customers. Thanks to our wonderful team of 1,600+ Qontoers, we also made it to the LinkedIn Top Companies French ranking!


Our values:

Customer focus | Prioritize customers in everything you do

Ownership | Own your part, get things done

Teamwork | Make (team)work easy

Mastery | Continuously raise the bar

Integrity | Always do what‚Äôs right, and respect people


Our beliefs: At Qonto, we're committed to fostering a welcoming environment where everyone can thrive. We prioritize evaluating applicants based solely on skills and potential, ensuring diversity with 50% international team members, 44% women, and 20% parents. Join us in building a workplace that celebrates diversity and individuality.


Discover the steps we took to create a discrimination-free hiring process.


At Qonto, Data Analytics is essential and central to our business. You will join a team of talented data analysts, that provides key insights used to make strategic decisions across the company.

The BI Team is organized into five teams working in distinct areas, that regularly work together on cross-functional topics.

As a Data Analyst, you will apply your analytical skills and passion for data to propel our product development and accelerate the growth of the business.


üë©‚Äçüíªüßë‚ÄçüíªAs a Data Analyst at Qonto, you will :


- Develop data analytics solutions by creating sources of truth, designing the best metrics for our key business drivers, and building and promoting self-service tools and dashboards that empower your stakeholders.

- Solve problems pragmatically focusing on delivering value, identifying improvements, and creating scalable & reliable solutions.

- Perform strategic and ad-hoc analysis in support of key stakeholders across the business.

- Partner with key stakeholders to identify analytical opportunities and instill a data-informed mindset across the business

- Depending on your level of seniority, you will share knowledge and mentor less experienced Analysts to enable them to add more value sooner and become thought partners to other members of the team.

- Advocate for the team‚Äôs work to meet internal standards for code style, quality, maintainability, and best practices.


üöß Example of your future projects


- The Product Manager of Cards wants to understand the success of this new ‚Äútop-up‚Äù feature that the team recently delivered. You lead a cross-team effort to set up the success metric of this feature and measure its impact.


- We have recently released a new pricing strategy. The Strategy team wants you to assess what default billing option (annual or monthly) would generate more revenue and increase engagement.


- The onboarding team wants to understand this drop in activation they have observed for the last three weeks. They need your help: how to distinguish the signal from the noise? Because fluctuations always occur‚Ä¶


- You have identified an improvement to our dashboard delivery process, you take the lead in improving this process and ensuring everyone in the team is aligned.


- You create a Python library to automate the analysis of experiments, later you train the team on its usage and limitations.


ü§î¬†What you can expect


- Work in a fast-paced multicultural environment with a focus on shipping quality, fast:

Yes, we go fast, but we have a strong focus on quality: you work on one project at a time with a problem-solving mindset.

- Have ownership: you are¬†autonomously in charge¬†of your project passing through all stages: understanding business needs, data modeling, and visualizing data.

- Knowledge sharing: across the whole tech team (internal & external talk, weekly meetings, tech monthly) and the community (articles and meet-ups).

- A¬†modern data stack:¬†We mainly use¬†Snowflake¬†as a warehouse,¬†Airflow¬†and¬†DBT¬†as ELT, and¬†Tableau/Metabase¬†as our data visualization tools.


ü§ù About your future Manager


You will work closely with Nacer, our Lead Data Analyst for Product.


His background:

Nacer joined Qonto after six years of experience in the financial markets industry. Within the data team, he leads the effort to create a Product Analytics capability: helping product managers create value for our customers through data-driven insights and experiments.


What can he bring to you and the team?

Nacer can offer strategic data leadership and analytics expertise to elevate the team's capabilities, infusing a robust data-informed culture that drives innovative product development and sharpens our competitive edge in the marketplace. His collaborative approach and dedication to mentorship will not only enhance your technical proficiency but also foster a shared vision for success across the entire organization.


üèÖAbout You


- You have a passion for transforming data into value.

- You have a strong Business & Product Sense, you can challenge and define the business Value of a project.

- You‚Äôre not afraid of learning new tools if they serve your goal. You probably already know Python, SQL, and Tableau (or a similar dashboarding tool) and look forward to adding new skills to your belt.

- You‚Äôve got a strong background in statistics and advanced analytics, and experience in delivering product-shaping insights

- You are proficient in designing and implementing robust experimental protocols (such as A/B tests)

- You‚Äôve got a solid grasp of data visualization and storytelling: you know how to present data compellingly so that our stakeholders can make the best business decisions with our insights.

- Other traits and skills we are looking for include¬†accountability, energy, a hands-on mindset (when needed), and framing problems/situations sharply.


At Qonto we understand that true diversity isn't just about ticking boxes on a hiring checklist. Apply regardless of the boxes you tick! Who knows? You may have the missing piece of the puzzle we've been searching for all along.

üéÅ Perks


A tailor-made and dynamic career track. An inclusive work environment. And so much more to help you succeed.


- Offices in Paris, Berlin, Milan, Barcelona, and Belgrade;

- Tailor-made remote work policy depending on the job you apply for and where you live;

- Competitive salary package;

- A¬†meal voucher;

- Public transportation reimbursement (part or global);

- A great health insurance (depending on the country);

- Employee well-being initiatives: access to Moka Care¬†to take care of your mental health and great offers for sports and wellness activities;

- A progressive disability, and parenthood policy as part of our commitment to the¬†Parental Act¬†(1 in 6 of Qonto employees is a parent!) and childcare benefits with selected partners;

- Monthly team events.


üí™ Our hiring process:


- Interviews with your Talent Acquisition Manager and future managers

- A remote exercise to demonstrate your skills and give you a taste of what working at Qonto could be like


We will send you an interview guide so you can best prepare yourself.

On average, our process lasts 20 working days and offers usually follow within 48 hours ü§û



To learn more about us:

Qonto's Blog¬†|¬†Les √âchos I L'Usine Digitale |¬†Courrier Cadres

column15:

column4:
Nous, c'est papernest.

Notre ambition? Devenir la plateforme num√©ro 1 dans la souscription et la gestion des contrats, et tout √ßa en un clic.

Depuis notre lancement en 2015, nous n‚Äôavons pas arr√™t√© de grandir : nous sommes d√©sormais plus de 900 employ√©s, avons accompagn√© plus de 1M utilisateurs, nous sommes pr√©sents sur 5 march√©s en Europe et avons des bureaux √† Paris, Reims, Barcelone et Varsovie.

Nous sommes fiers de faire partie des 120 startups de la French Tech pour la troisi√®me ann√©e cons√©cutive et nous sommes convaincus que chaque succ√®s vient principalement de nos √©quipes !
column15:
For almost 10 years, papernest has successfully assisted over 1.5 million users in alleviating one of life's most tedious tasks: contract management. Our innovative solution empowers customers to seamlessly move, manage, and switch their contracts, all within a unified platform, and best of all, for free. Our services are available across France, Spain and Italy (for the time being !)

In an ever-changing world, we take confident steps, guided by the continuous development of our self-sustaining business model. Our success story is woven around an innovative B2B2C model, forged through strategic partnerships with major players in real estate and banking.

We are dedicated to fostering an exciting and vibrant work environment because that's what brings out the best in us. We believe that business needs to be disruptive and ambitious in order to thrive.

However we're not limited to just being good at business. We are also committed to our social responsibility as we strive to actively contribute to the community we belong to, minimize our environmental impact, and aim to foster a culture of social engagement and consciousness among our co-workers.

At the heart of our philosophy is the commitment to long-term success over short-term convenience. We highly value the contributions of each of our 800+ employees, providing them with ample opportunities for growth and the development of invaluable skills.

Pour relever ces d√©fis, nous recherchons un¬∑e stagiaire Data Analyst¬† en fin d'√©tudes¬†pour une p√©riode de 5 mois minimum √† partir de septembre 2024.¬†

Bas√©¬∑e √† Paris, tu travailleras activement sur des probl√©matiques data diverses afin d‚Äôaider l‚Äô√©quipe √† r√©soudre les probl√®mes rencontr√©s, √™tre plus efficace et it√©rer plus rapidement gr√¢ce √† une donn√©e fiable.¬†¬†

‚ö°Ô∏èTes futures missions :

Am√©liorer la productivit√© de plusieurs √©quipes business

  • Automatiser le calcul des primes de notre √©quipe commerciale de plus de 400 personnes r√©partis entre la France et l‚ÄôEspagne
  • Automatiser certaines t√¢ches de l‚Äô√©quipe par la cr√©ation de nouveaux outils innovants
  • Mettre en place des syst√®mes d‚Äôalerting pour rep√©rer d‚Äô√©ventuels probl√®mes et anticiper les changements march√©s

    • Cr√©er de la valeur via de l‚Äôanalytics

  • R√©aliser des analyses ad hoc en support de prises de d√©cision et identifier des leviers de croissance
  • Mener des analyses approfondies sur des sujets √† la crois√©e entre les Op√©rations, la Qualit√© et les RH (recrutement, mont√©e en comp√©tence etc.)
  • Produire des analyses ad hoc et √™tre force de proposition sur les √©volutions op√©rationnelles √† apporter

    • Garantir la fiabilit√© et l'accessibilit√© de la donn√©e

  • S‚Äôassurer de la fiabilit√© de la donn√©e provenant de diff√©rentes sources
  • Maintenir et √©laborer des dashboards afin de rendre accessible la donn√©e √† l‚Äô√©quipe op√©ration

    • üîé Profil recherch√© :

  • Tu es issu¬∑e d‚Äôune √©cole d‚Äôing√©nieur ou de commerce
  • Tu es passionn√©¬∑e de data et de digital
  • Tu es¬†rigoureux¬∑se, d√©brouillard¬∑e et ind√©pendant¬∑e
  • Tu es √† l'aise avec le SQL, le traitement et la visualisation de donn√©es (Tableau, Data Studio, etc.), et tu as¬†id√©alement comp√©tences en data science
  • Tu as un bon niveau d'anglais

    • üíúCe que nous t‚Äôoffrons :

    En rejoignant papernest tu b√©n√©ficieras d‚Äôun package compos√© de:

  • Ton tire transport pris en charge √† 50%
  • Tickets Restaurants Swile

    • ‚Ä¶ et tu √©volueras dans un environnement de travail :

  • Flexible, gr√¢ce √† une politique remote friendly (1 jour de t√©l√©travail possible par semaine) ;
  • Motivant et o√π il fait bon vivre, en 2022 nous avons re√ßu le label HappyTrainee qui r√©compense les entreprises pour la qualit√© de leur accueil, leur accompagnement et les missions confi√©es;
  • Excitant et challengeant, chez nous les stagiaires ‚Äúphotocopies-caf√©‚Äù √ßa n‚Äôexiste pas ! Membre √† part enti√®re de l‚Äô√©quipe, tu es ici pour apprendre, mais √©galement pour partager tes id√©es, mettre en place des projets et nous aider √† atteindre nos objectifs üöÄ
  • Inclusif, tout le monde √† sa place chez papernest, et avec plus de 46 nationalit√©s diff√©rentes, chez nous il n‚Äôest pas rare de commencer sa phrase en fran√ßais and finish it in English o en espa√±ol ¬°
  • Favorisant la coh√©sion d‚Äô√©quipe avec des √©v√©nements et des team buildings r√©guliers;
  • Gourmand : petit d√©jeuner offert tous les mardis ainsi qu‚Äôun r√©frig√©rateur Ideel Garden connect√© pour des d√©jeuners sains et √©quilibr√©s !

Nous avons h√¢te de te rencontrer et cela peu importe ton √¢ge, ton sexe, tes origines, ta religion, ton orientation sexuelle, ou ton handicap. Nos processus de s√©lection ainsi que notre environnement de travail sont adapt√©s √† tous.

    Mesdames, nous vous encourageons vivement √† postuler ! En effet, m√™me si vous estimez ne pas r√©pondre √† la totalit√© des crit√®res mentionn√©s dans cette offre, sachez qu'ils sont √† titre indicatifs. Nous √©tudierons avec grand int√©r√™t votre candidature. La parit√© et la diversit√© sont un atout pour nos √©quipes!

column15:
About BlaBlaCar

BlaBlaCar is the world‚Äôs leading community-based travel app enabling 26 million members a year to carpool or travel by bus in 21 countries. Our team of 800 employees counts over 50 nationalities and is spread across our 5 global offices, 30% working fully remotely.

About BlaBlaCar Daily¬†

We are an independent business unit growing fast following the acquisition of Klaxit in March 2023. The BlablaCar Daily team consists of 100 people together building the best commute carpooling solution. We are actively developing and testing the product in France, Belgium and Switzerland with thousands of active carpoolers every day.

Your Mission

Our Data services are organized following Data Mesh principles, distributing data ownership to domain-specific teams that manage, own, and serve the data as a product.¬†

The Data Daily team‚Äôs mission is to support BBC Daily Stakeholders make informed decisions through reliable Data Products. We‚Äôre the central data team for the BlaBlaCar Daily organization, working with all teams across Business, tech, Marketing and Support units. We deliver data products that address fraud-fighting, analytics to our hundreds of partners, and many more.¬†

As a Data Analyst, you directly influence user experience. At the intersection of different domains,¬† you have the opportunity to enrich your own knowledge and skills while collaborating with Product Managers, Designers, Software Engineers and customer-facing teams. You'll work closely with your Engineering Manager, 1 Data Engineer and 2 other Data Analysts.¬†As well, you will belong to the Analytics Chapter, an internal community of 25+ analysts who meet regularly to share, learn and innovate on data analytics.

Your Responsibilities

As a Data Analyst working on the Data Daily scope, you‚Äôll be responsible for:

‚Ä¢Infusing a data-informed mindset to our Business and Product strategy by working conjointly with Leadership to define, analyze and report on KPIs¬†

‚Ä¢Providing actionable insights on our user‚Äôs behavior during Product discovery and delivery

‚Ä¢Overseeing Product experimentation for several feature squads: designing AB test protocols, analyzing their impact, and communicating their results

¬†‚Ä¢Building, improving, and maintaining a suite of self-service Tableau dashboards and supporting data consumers in becoming autonomous in their usage of data

‚Ä¢Working with our stack: dbt / SQL / Tableau / Airflow / BigQuery / GCP

‚Ä¢Ensuring effective communication and support to stakeholders with varying levels of data proficiency

In your first 6 months on the team, you will contribute directly to various product improvements in our roadmap, and support our internal teams managing their partners in an ideal manner.¬†

Your Qualifications

‚Ä¢At least 2 years of professional experience working as a Data Analyst, preferably in Product Analytics

‚Ä¢Excellent command of SQL

‚Ä¢Proficiency in data visualization tools

‚Ä¢Passion for the Mobility industry

‚Ä¢Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, ability to think strategically and communicating data clearly

‚Ä¢You are organized, results-driven, and are able to prioritize in a changing environment

‚Ä¢You enjoy sharing and learning from others

‚Ä¢Fluent in English

If you don‚Äôt meet 100% of the qualifications outlined above, tell us why you‚Äôd still be a great fit for this role in your application!

What we have to offer:

‚Ä¢ Full remote possible in the country of employment

‚Ä¢ 4 additional weeks parental leave 100% paid

‚Ä¢ Financial support for home office equipment

‚Ä¢ 25 days holiday per year + RTT

‚Ä¢ Local meal plan policies (Swile card in France)

‚Ä¢ 50% transportation paid in France (Forfait Mobilit√© Durable)

‚Ä¢ Relocation package and visa support

‚Ä¢ Free unlimited carpooling & bus rides

‚Ä¢ Personal growth via trainings, mentorship, and internal mobility programs

‚Ä¢ Employee Stock Ownership plan

‚Ä¢ Regular team building events

‚Ä¢ Mental health support through Moka.care

Interested in joining the ride?

Here‚Äôs what your hiring journey will look like:

‚Ä¢ a 45-min video-call with Chlo√©, Talent Acquisition Manager, to get to know you, understand your career expectations and answer your questions

‚Ä¢ a 45 min video-call with Kineret Kimhi your future Manager to evaluate your communication and teamwork skills, followed by a 30 min live business case

‚Ä¢ a home assignment to evaluate your technical skills, followed by a 60-min video-call with a future colleague and product manager

‚Ä¢ a 30-min video-call with Emmanuel Martin-Chave, VP Data

Usually, our hiring process lasts 20-25 days and offers come within 48 hours.

Not sure yet?¬†Check out our 100 reasons to join BlaBlaCar!
column38:
BlaBlaCar is the world‚Äôs leading community-based travel app enabling 26 million active members a year to share a ride in 21 countries. Its technology matches drivers with empty seats with passengers heading the same way, so they can share the cost of the trip. With the mission to be the go-to marketplace for shared travel, BlaBlaCar combines carpooling with bus journeys from over 4000 operators to offer a wide choice of affordable and sustainable travel solutions, all in one app.

In 2022, BlaBlaCar‚Äôs trusted community connected 2 million meeting points worldwide and enabled 90 million human encounters. Carpool drivers saved 450 million euros, and all BlaBlaCar‚Äôs mobility services contributed to avoiding 1.5 million tonnes of CO2 emissions.

column15:
Contexte¬†

Herm√®s s‚Äôest lanc√© dans un projet strat√©gique de mise en place d‚Äôune solution de tra√ßabilit√© produit du fournisseur au client sur l‚Äôensemble des m√©tiers et de ses activit√©s.¬†

La tra√ßabilit√© repose sur de nombreuses donn√©es provenant de multiples syst√®mes.¬†

Dans ce contexte le r√¥le d‚ÄôExpert Fonctionnel Data a pour but de maitriser, s√©curiser, la compl√©tude la qualit√© la p√©rennit√© de l‚Äôinformation permettant de r√©pondre aux enjeux de tra√ßabilit√©.

Au sein du d√©partement Supply-Chain SI, vous faites partie de l‚Äô√©quipe ‚Äò‚ÄôSolution Tra√ßabilit√©‚Äô‚Äô.

Vous travaillez d‚Äôune part avec l‚Äô√©quipe pour collecter les besoins de nos m√©tiers en termes de tra√ßabilit√©, et d‚Äôautre part avec les diff√©rentes √©quipes HSI pour identifier les donn√©es dans les syst√®mes sources et les rendre disponible pour le syst√®me de tra√ßabilit√©.¬†

Missions

  • Collecter et Comprendre les besoins en mati√®re de donn√©es n√©cessaires √† des cas d‚Äôusage de la tra√ßabilit√©, en collaboration avec l‚ÄôAMOA et/ou le data manager m√©tier.¬†
  • Traduire le besoin en termes de donn√©es avec l‚Äôaide des experts solutions (ERP, WMS, POS‚Ä¶).¬†

Job Description:

Airbus Helicopters is looking for a Data Quality management leader (f/m) to join our Data Governance central team based in Marignane, France.

Airbus Helicopters ambition is to make Vertical Lift the best choice to save lives, protect people, connect cities and reach any place.

The continuous improvement of the company goes through an efficient data management and the deployment of new digital capabilities, leading to reliability, competitiveness, sustainability and empowerment of its employees.

Today, organization is challenged by a scissor effect: an accelerated growth in technology and an urgent need to simplify a highly complex, fragmented and siloed data landscape.

The challenge of AH Data Governance organization is to drive the company to maximize data readiness for value creation in compliance with laws and regulations.

We are supporting business with methods, tools and animation of key data topics, such as the deployment of a data community, the set-up of the company data catalog, the acceleration of access to data, the guidance about data protection and compliance, etc.

In 2023, we have initiated a Company Data Quality Management framework, with the objective to put under control the key data of the company, securing the required level of quality.

With this open position, we will accelerate the deployment of this initiative and make Data Quality a key enabler to company performance.

You are looking for:

- ¬† ¬† ¬† A challenge

- ¬† ¬† ¬† A job with multiple and various interfaces

- ¬† ¬† ¬† A wide view on Airbus Helicopters activities

- ¬† ¬† ¬† A key role in company transformation

Your working environment:

Major economic hub with Marseille-Provence Airport, Marignane is a dynamic city in the southeast of France. It is located near the cities of Aix-en-Provence and Marseille, which host a rich cultural and tourist offer. Close to the beaches of the C√¥te Bleue, it offers many options for water sports activities.

How we care for you:

  • Financial rewards: Attractive salary, agreements on success and profit sharing schemes, employee savings plan abounded by Airbus and employee stock purchase plan on a voluntary basis.

  • Work / Life Balance:¬† Extra days-off for special occasions, holiday transfer option, a Staff council offering many social, cultural and sport activities and other services.

  • Wellbeing / Health: Complementary health insurance coverage (disability, invalidity, death). Depending on the site: health services center, concierge services, gym, carpooling application.

  • Individual development: Great upskilling opportunities and development prospects¬† with unlimited access to +10.000 e-learning courses to develop your employability, certifications, expert career path, accelerated development programmes, national and international mobility.

At Airbus, we support you to work, connect and collaborate more easily and flexibly.¬† ¬† Wherever possible, we foster flexible working arrangements to stimulate innovative thinking.

Your challenges:

Organization - Accountable for the process deployment

  • Finalize the set-up of Data Quality Management framework and ensure continuous improvement

  • Ensure methods integration within AH processes

  • Drive the development of required tools to support this new process

Connection - Ensure the efficient deployment and execution of Data Quality Management throughout business domains, animating and supporting key contributors to:

  • Identify Data Quality Topics considered as priorities

  • Understand non-quality root causes and propose remediation plans

  • Set-up continuous monitoring of selected Data Quality criteria

  • Follow-up the execution of remediation plans

Sponsorship ‚Äì Drive decisions and advise management

  • Report to AH top management about Data Quality status to ensure Data is managed as a company asset

Decisions taken will have a significant short-term impact on company performance and a long term influence on overall data management culture.

Your profile:

  • With a Master Degree and the conviction that Data is key to reach excellence, you are recognized for:

    • being autonomous, rigorous, a team player, results-oriented,

    • having adaptation and communication skills.

  • Expected competencies:

    • project management,

    • change management,

    • data management & analysis

  • French & English are mandatory.

This position requires a security clearance or will require being eligible for clearance by the recognized authorities.

Not a 100% match? No worries! Airbus supports your personal growth with customized development solutions.

Take your career to a new level and apply online now!

Job Description:

Airbus Helicopters is looking for a Data Governance Manager (f/m), based in Marignane, France, to join our Global Business Data Office.

You will be responsible for the day-to-day management of the Global Business Data Custodian network, ensuring that Data Governance best practices are routinely used everywhere in the business.

Your working environment:

Major economic hub with Marseille-Provence Airport, Marignane is a dynamic city in the southeast of France. It is located near the cities of Aix-en-Provence and Marseille, which host a rich cultural and tourist offer. Close to the beaches of the C√¥te Bleue, it offers many options for water sports activities.

How we care for you:

  • Financial rewards: Attractive salary, agreements on success and profit sharing schemes, employee savings plan abounded by Airbus and employee stock purchase plan on a voluntary basis.

  • Work / Life Balance:¬† Extra days-off for special occasions, holiday transfer option, a Staff council offering many social, cultural and sport activities and other services.

  • Individual development: Great upskilling opportunities and development prospects¬† with unlimited access to +10.000 e-learning courses to develop your employability, certifications, expert career path, accelerated development programmes, national and international mobility.

At Airbus, we support you to work, connect and collaborate more easily and flexibly.¬†Wherever possible, we foster flexible working arrangements to stimulate innovative thinking.

Your Challenges:

  • Be responsible for supervising the good governance of Global Business‚Äôs data,¬†

  • Create a network of official Data Custodians who shall act as the sentinels of Global Business‚Äôs data.

  • Create new Business Objects in the Airbus Helicopters Data Catalogue as required,

  • Manage all Data Requests coming into the Global Business Data Office, and liaise with Global Business‚Äôs Process

  • Owners & Process Improvers to make sure that the data produced by their processes is On-Quality for the whole Company.

  • Assist the Data Officer in ensuring that Global Business‚Äôs data is properly protected, through a combination of means: data classification, document tagging & ensuring compliance with Company directives (such as G-MET-030). This will include regular internal communication to stakeholders & newcomers.

Your profile:

The Data Governance Manager must have a good understanding of:

  • Large data models
  • The challenges faced when dealing with master data
  • Prior experience of working with business processes
  • Prior experience of QMS systems¬†
  • Prior experience of data catalogues & concepts such as Business Objects & data lifecycle management
  • Marketing & Sales process knowledge, particularly relating to SAP data sources & data interactions between SAP & Salesforce
  • Transformation initiative

This position requires a security clearance or will require being eligible for clearance by the recognized authorities.

column38:
Stago is a French company in the In Vitro Diagnostics (IVD) industry with international activities. With operations in 18 countries, it has nearly 2,600 employees, half of whom are based out of France.
Stago is an independent, privately-owned company that brings together all skills and know-how in the field of biology and instrumentation to develop, manufacture and market the widest range of reagents and instruments for hemostasis analysis throughout the world.

Using the most advanced computer, electronic and biological technologies, Stago invests in research and innovation to develop ever more effective reagents, instruments and diagnostic solutions.
With more than 350 products on the market, Stago is a world leader in In Vitro Diagnostics and a preferred partner of medical laboratories.
Customer satisfaction is a strong value and everyone is aware that behind their actions there is a patient.

Dans un monde en constante √©volution, AXA XL prot√®ge ce qui compte le plus pour nos clients et nos communaut√©s. Nous savons que la durabilit√© est √† la base d'un avenir plus r√©silient. Notre √©quipe Data Finance recherche un¬∑e Data Quality Manager, bas√©¬∑e √† Lille ou Paris.

Au c≈ìur de la direction financi√®re du groupe Decathlon et du r√©seau Digital United, notre √©quipe Data Finance assure la conception, la mise en place et le bon fonctionnement de solutions informatiques (>80 solutions) pour les diff√©rents processus financiers.

Ces solutions permettent:

  • aux financiers d‚Äôassurer leur m√©tier de mani√®re optimis√©e (cl√¥ture comptable, gestion des achats, pilotage √©conomique, ‚Ä¶)
  • de faciliter la prise de d√©cision, r√©duire le temps d‚Äôanalyse et de contr√¥le de donn√©es

TA FUTURE CONTRIBUTION

Tu collaboreras avec nos √©quipes produits et business afin:

  • De mettre en place des standards et politique qualit√© sur le domaine, le respect de ces standards, des propositions de changements dans les processus d'utilisation des donn√©es ou les syst√®mes sources, √©vang√©lisation de l'importance de la qualit√© des donn√©es aupr√®s des parties prenantes de l'entreprise et explication des bonnes pratiques.
  • D‚Äôaccompagner le data management, les data owners et les data product managers √† la mise en ≈ìuvre des normes de qualit√© des donn√©es sur le p√©rim√®tre, √† la d√©couverte de la donn√©e, au recueil et challenge des besoins de qualit√©, de mettre en place des processus de contr√¥le autour des outils de r√©f√©rence, reporting sur la performance et la qualit√© des donn√©es.
  • D‚Äôinstaurer de l‚Äôam√©lioration continue de la qualit√© de donn√©es, construire et mettre en place des strat√©gies d‚Äôam√©lioration de qualit√© de donn√©es en lien avec les producteurs de donn√©es.

Pour ce faire, il te faudra:

  • Faire le lien entre les √©quipes data governance et le domaine Finance
  • Collaborer avec les √©quipes data, produit et support pour veiller √† ce que les processus de cr√©ation des donn√©es soient conformes aux normes de qualit√© des donn√©es.
  • Collaborer avec les √©quipes de s√©curit√© pour garantir la confidentialit√© et l'int√©grit√© des donn√©es.
  • Concevoir et mettre en ≈ìuvre des outils de contr√¥les et de visualisations de la qualit√© des donn√©es, y compris des alertes pour d√©tecter les erreurs et les incoh√©rences.
  • Impl√©menter des outils pour automatiser les t√¢ches de contr√¥le et de correction des donn√©es.
  • Participer √† la conception et √† la mise en ≈ìuvre de solutions pour le nettoyage et la normalisation des donn√©es.

CE DONT TU AS BESOIN POUR REUSSIR

  • Exp√©rience avec Spark, Python

  • Capacit√© √† travailler dans un environnement distribu√© et en constante √©volution.
  • Solides comp√©tences en mati√®re d'analyse et de r√©solution de probl√®mes

CE QUE NOUS OFFRONS

  • Libert√© de choix de l'outil de travail (Mac, Windows)
  • √âquipe de projet locale et partage avec le r√©seau mondial (parcours international)

DECATHLON DIGITAL

Imaginez si la technologie nous permettait de repousser les fronti√®res et d'offrir des exp√©riences sportives in√©dites. C'est pr√©cis√©ment notre ambition chez Decathlon Digital ! Nous sommes une √©quipe de plus de 5 000 experts en ing√©nierie logicielle, gestion de produits, donn√©es, cloud et cybers√©curit√©, r√©partis √† Paris, Lille et Amsterdam. Ensemble, nous cr√©ons la plus vaste plateforme sportive num√©rique, en exploitant les innovations technologiques pour optimiser la cha√Æne de valeur, concevoir des exp√©riences connect√©es et donner une seconde vie √† nos produits.

Changeons la donne pour de bon. Notre passion du sport nous guide et nous voulons qu‚Äôelle perdure. C‚Äôest pourquoi nous nous engageons √† b√¢tir un mod√®le technologique plus durable, en r√©duisant notre impact direct sur l'environnement, et en cr√©ant un espace s√ªr et inclusif pour apprendre et nous √©panouir ensemble. column15:
üîé¬†In a nutshell, what are we looking for?

We are looking for a passionate and brillant Data Product Owner with a strong expertise in Tech Products and a sharp business sense to work directly with our CTO and co-founder Oscar (who is currently owner of the ‚Äúproduct‚Äù part).

You will be the right hand of Oscar.

ü•ä¬†Challenges ahead for you

  1. Perfectly understand business and operational issues. Interact with both tech and non-tech teams on a daily basis, making different views converge by being a driving force.

  2. Translate these issues into technical solutions by:

    _Conceptualizing the main topics at stakes

    _Suggesting several solutions including prioritization and required tradeoffs

    _Planning and orchestrating the delivery

    _Orchestrating the delivery of a project involving several teams that you don‚Äôt manage directly and who have different day-to-day focuses

üèà¬†About your future Team

You will have to interact autonomously with all the Tech teams at Stockly. There are 6 of them:

  • Backoffice : Building our custom-made interface for orders tracking and after sales service (e.g. customers messages). Meet Camille, in charge of the team in this video

  • Business Intelligence : Including data-backed analysis into decision making processes and monitoring

  • Engine : Modeling new issues into our Tech (e.g. operational, commercial, financial). Meet Sylvain, talking about the Engine team in this video

  • Integrations : Technically integrating our partners systems with our product

  • Tech Solvers : Technical support on orders management and corrections (e.g. databases updates)

Backoffice and Engine will be your primary interlocutors.

You will also interact a lot with Business Teams (Key Account Managers, Business Developers, ‚Ä¶)

Meet Oscar, CTO of Stockly in this video.

‚öôÔ∏è Your¬†missions

  • Structuring multi-months projects into a sequence of ‚Äú2-3 days tasks‚Äù easy to delegate, with clear realistic guidelines answering the expressed needs

  • Build strong, easy-to-understand and reliable documentation about our product

  • Enable more business for Stockly by making the whole organization focus on the most important features and prioritizing correctly

  • Follow, review and support the delivery, then the implementation and go-lives. Anticipate potential issues, make sure everything goes well, correct anything that goes wrong.

  • Become our product leader: take the role that our CTO Oscar is currently owning on the Product part

üíù¬†About your future benefits

Competitive packages including:

  • BSPCE (stock options) üöÄ

  • Health insurance provided by Alan üíä

  • Meal vouchers by Swile üçΩÔ∏è

  • 50% reimbursement of your Navigo Pass üöã

  • A central and amazing working environment in Le Sentier (center of Paris) üíº

  • Flexible and remote-friendly policy üè°

  • Stockly dinners together every other Thursday üçª Stockly breakfasts together every other Friday ü•ê

  • Coffee, tea and fruits available everyday üçá

  • Climbing, football teams and more üßó

  • Learning everyday in a challenging, fast-paced environment ü§ì

‚öôÔ∏è¬†About how we work

Every team has a daily meeting to align on priorities and solve issues ‚áí You won‚Äôt be left alone!

Every Monday we have a global weekly meeting where every team shares what they are working on and what they will do for the coming week ‚áí You will have visibility on the whole company!

Every quarter we have our OKR meeting (Objectives, Key Results) where each team shows the results of the previous quarter and the objectives of the following one ‚áí You will see the company grow and your own role inside of it!

During all these meetings everyone can challenge each other and all questions are more than welcome ‚áí Transparency is one of our key values, and we are always open to new ideas!
column38:
üî≠¬†Stockly is a tech-retail company solving the supply/demand mismatch in e-commerce.

  • With our technology, we connect in real-time e-commerce websites in need for stock with the inventory of hundreds of other retailers who have the same products available, and who can fulfill the order on their behalf.

  • E-retailers can sell products they don‚Äôt own, while others can gain additional sales, in a seamless experience for the end-consumer.

üèÜ¬†Our mission is to create the world‚Äôs 1st globally shared inventory for retail. To better understand what we do, check out¬†our french pitch at BFMTV (üá´üá∑), or¬†our English pitch at Techstars (üá¨üáß).

üöÄ¬†We‚Äôve already raised $20M+ with European top-tier investors among which Daphni, Eurazeo and Raise. Our proprietary technology, coded in-house from scratch, is already live across Europe with 450+ e-retailers, we grow x4 each year and won‚Äôt stop there.
column50:
üèéÔ∏è¬†Our process goes fast, we are reactive and we adapt to your availabilities. We can typically go through the whole process in 2-3 weeks:

  1. 20min video-call with a member of our Talent Acquisition team - To understand your background and motivations, and reply to your questions

  2. 1-hour face to face (or remote) interview with Oscar our CTO - To have a deeper discussion

  3. Half-a-day immersion at Stockly to meet all the team (on site) - Meet the team, put yourself in the shoes of a Stockler, ask all your questions

    If you pass this last step, you will receive a üéâ¬†Formal offer üéâ

column4: Connecting Food is a Data management solution for agrifood supply chains for precise risk assessment, monitoring and compliance on quality and CSR criteria. column15:
Your mission within the company:

As part of the Customer Success team, your mission is to ensure the successful implementation of our solutions at our clients. You will actively participate in the strategic discussions regarding the development and enhancement of our product offerings and solution modules. Your role is crucial in helping our clients achieve their goals and in contributing to the continuous improvement of our services.

Your daily responsibilities:

Initially, you will be integrated into a major project for one of our clients, where you will implement a new module of our solution. You will be responsible for:

  • Defining and documenting the process

  • Configuring part of the solution

  • Communicating and coordinating with technical teams regarding developments

  • Handling a large amount of data

  • Developing relevant dashboards using a BI tool

These operational tasks will be complemented by a strategic dimension:

  • Automating the operational tasks you have carried out within this specific project

  • Contributing to the structuring of our offerings

  • Collaborating with our product team to identify areas for improvement in our module

Subsequently, you will be integrated into other projects and may work across all modules of our solution. Your responsibilities will include:

  • Participating in new implementation projects: studying feasibility, configuring the platform, testing data, etc.

  • Providing support to our clients using the solution: responding to their requests, investigating and resolving issues, and conducting training sessions

  • Product exploration: translating needs into specifications

  • Testing new technical deliveries

What we offer:

  • Meaningful work: at Connecting Food, our mission is to bring more transparency to the agri-food supply chains

  • A learning environment within a diverse team (Solution experts, Customer success managers, product owners, developers, salespeople, etc.)

  • An innovative digital solution (blockchain, web apps, Digital Twin, etc.)

  • A key role in daily interactions with our clients (major players in the agri-food industry)

Edenred France propose des solutions de paiement √† usages sp√©cifiques d√©di√©es √† l‚Äôalimentation (Ticket Restaurant¬Æ), √† la motivation (Kad√©os, Edenred Solutions CSE, Ticket CESU, Edenred T√©l√©travail), √† la mobilit√© (compte mobilit√© Edenred x Betterway) et √† l‚Äôengagement des collaborateurs (plateforme Edenred Engagement).

Fid√®les √† la raison d‚Äô√™tre du Groupe, ¬´¬†Enrich connections. For good.¬†¬ª, ces solutions am√©liorent le bien-√™tre et le pouvoir d‚Äôachat des utilisateurs. Elles favorisent √©galement l‚Äôacc√®s √† une nourriture plus saine, √† des produits plus respectueux
de l‚Äôenvironnement et √† une mobilit√© plus douce.

Les collaborateurs d‚ÄôEdenred en France s‚Äôengagent au quotidien pour faire du monde du travail un monde connect√© plus efficace, plus s√ªr et plus responsable.

Soigner mieux en soignant ensemble, c'est aussi agir avec bienveillance. √Ä l'image du secteur dans lequel nous √©voluons, nous favorisons la diversit√©, l'inclusion et l'√©quit√©. Nous mettons en valeur vos comp√©tences et votre savoir-faire, et bannissons toute forme de discrimination, qu'elle soit sexuelle, religieuse ou politique.
column38:
Le vieillissement de la population entraine une augmentation consid√©rable du recours au soin, mais les lourdeurs administratives continuent d‚Äô√©roder le temps consacr√© aux patient¬∑es. Fluidifier le parcours de soin gr√¢ce au digital se fait donc de plus en plus n√©cessaire. Dans ce but, une multitude d‚Äôoutils existent, mais l‚Äôabsence de compatibilit√© avec les syst√®mes existants limitent l‚Äôutilisation que les professionnel¬∑les de sant√© peuvent en faire (donn√©es incompl√®tes, parcours de soins fragment√©‚Ä¶). C‚Äôest pour d√©bloquer le potentiel de la e-sant√© en cr√©ant des synergies et un partage donn√©es entre l‚Äôensemble de ces solutions que Lifen, aujourd‚Äôhui actrice du Next 40, est n√©e.

Sa plateforme facilite l‚Äôint√©gration de solutions innovantes √† l‚Äôh√¥pital et permet l‚Äô√©change de donn√©es entre les diff√©rents acteur¬∑rices (h√¥pitaux, cliniques, m√©decins de ville, √âtat, √©diteur¬∑rices de logiciels‚Ä¶). Cette solution r√©pond aussi aux enjeux gouvernementaux portants sur la modernisation de notre syst√®me de soin. En optimisant la communication et le relai d‚Äôinformations entre les √©tablissements, les √©quipes de Lifen font √©conomiser un temps pr√©cieux au personnel soignant. Elles lui permettent surtout de se concentrer sur son c≈ìur de m√©tier : l‚Äôaccompagnement des malades.

Aujourd‚Äôhui, ce sont plus de 850 cliniques et h√¥pitaux et 120 000 professionnel¬∑les de sant√© qui ont d√©j√† adopt√© Lifen. Plus de 2 millions de documents m√©dicaux transitent ainsi chaque mois, gr√¢ce √† son application de transmission s√©curis√©e.
column54:
At Lifen, we believe that everyone deserves high-quality, accessible, and financially sustainable healthcare. Our digital solutions are the missing piece for a truly patient-centric care system.

We build bridges between stakeholders by facilitating the information flow: providers, insurance companies, governments, patients and the most innovative digital health apps. How? We solve the interoperability puzzle, so digital health innovators and healthcare facilities don‚Äôt have to. Our FHIR platform helps cloud-based apps integrate seamlessly with primary data systems, sans the hassle of connector jigsaws.

Lifen is also a pioneer in Artificial Intelligence: we build algorithms that reliably and automatically structure and integrate health information for a truly complete and dependable record system, eliminating hundreds of thousands worth of hours of routine administrative tasks.

Born in Paris and growing all over Europe, we are more than 180 Lifeners committed to advancing the digital revolution in the healthcare sector.

column13: Data Analyst Junior H/F - CDD 6 mois
column15:
Our Mission

At Prose, we don‚Äôt believe in ‚Äúone-size-fits-most.‚Äù We create custom beauty care (hair & skin at the moment) that is inclusive to all profiles, needs, and preferences. Each of our products is customized to a person‚Äôs needs based on the results from an online consultation. The individual data is processed through a proprietary algorithm and made-to-order in the Prose lab using natural active ingredients. Marrying emerging technologies with the best in beauty, Prose is truly creating something special.

This is the opportunity to join a fast-growing scale-up and an energetic team that works together to deliver creative solutions that are transforming the way people think about and shop for hair and skin care. We‚Äôre looking for talented problem solvers who lead with passion and who face any task with a positive mindset. We are serving millions of customers right now in North America!

Position Summary

As a Data Analyst Junior, you are in charge of running various analyses in order to deliver insights and data-driven solutions to our stakeholders.

Key Responsibilities

  • Develop and deliver data based insights and solutions for our various stakeholders (chemists, marketing team, ‚Ä¶)
  • Contribute to end to end execution of experiments (A/B tests) that includes setup, QA , analysis and communication of results
  • Develop and maintain dashboards for RD and Innovation
  • Recommend different ways to constantly improve data reliability and quality
  • Stay current on new technologies and continuously improve skills
  • Bring your personal knowledge and ideas to help solve problems creatively and effectively
  • Promote the company's mission and values

Key Candidate Requirements

  • Master degree in engineering/statistics/business Analytics
  • Familiar with R with a good knowledge of data.table, Rmarkdown, ggplot2, plotly or equivalent
  • Fundamentals of statistics used in A/B testing
  • First experience in dataviz (Google Data Studio, Tibco Spotfire, etc.)
  • A knack for writing clean, readable and maintainable code
  • Familiar with Git, a Unix shell, an editor (or IDE) and all others day-to-day developer tools
  • Familiar with Python and SQL would be a plus
  • Demonstrates strong collaboration skills and ability to work cross functionally
  • Demonstrates ability to effectively communicate with both technical and non-technical stakeholders, in French and English

Perks & Benefits

  • Competitive compensation package (base salary, target bonus and equity)
  • Health insurance (Benefiz) 100% covered by Prose + tickets restaurants
  • Nice and trendy office located between Opera and Grands Boulevards (Paris, 2eme)
  • Wellness membership (ClassPass)
  • On-going training and development programs
  • An abundance of office snacks

Prose values

Intentional Inclusivity

  • We know the best ideas come from open minds and willingness to listen. While our products cater to the individual, an invitation into our process is always open to our community.
  • We value our differences and diverse backgrounds by communicating openly, managing with transparency and striving to understand one another‚Äôs perspective. It‚Äôs a key ingredient to our innovation.

Connected Collaboration

  • Our strength as a group will outlast our efforts as individual contributors. With offices across countries (and across boroughs) staying inventive and agile deepens our clear vision and consistent communication.
  • We stay in a spirit of entrepreneurial collaboration: We do not have consensus at all times, but we trust one another to work toward our common goals. Our success is an expression and result of our progressive and gratifying teamwork.

Driven, Together

  • We value ownership and coaching that encourages employees to think constructively and creatively about the business. We view employees as leaders and individuals who are accountable, resourceful and responsible. Anyone and everyone is encouraged to lead.
  • We recognize that in order to continue thinking one step ahead, we will need to try new things. We strive to provide an open environment that accepts this truth making space for new ideas to emerge.

Humanity Always

  • We assume good intentions in every interaction keeping ourselves accountable for the climate we create. We seek to understand our co-workers through this lens of conscious bienveillance, authenticity and fellowship.
  • We operate with the intention of preserving resources, creating an environment we can all live in ‚Äî for our business and the world. Sustainable care is essential to our ethos as an organization. We take a mindful approach to how we think about our people (employees) and our planet.
column38:
Prose est une start up franco-am√©ricaine, leader mondial de la beaut√© personnalis√©e, et acteur majeur de la BeautyTech. Avec son centre de recherche pluri-disciplinaire (Tech, Data, Chimie, Innovation, UX) bas√© √† Paris, Prose r√©volutionne l‚Äôindustrie cosm√©tique: apr√®s seulement 5 ans d‚Äôexistence Prose est l‚Äôune des marques en plus forte croissance aux Etats-Unis, avec un CA sup√©rieur a $100M.

Chez Prose, nous cr√©ons des produits de beaut√© sur-mesure, totalement personnalis√©s: nos clients remplissent une consultation en ligne, puis nos algorithmes se basent sur ces donn√©es pour cr√©er une formule unique √† chacun, que nous fabriquons puis livrons depuis notre usine √† Brooklyn.

Prose est √©galement une entreprise fortement engag√©e: labellis√©e B-Corp depuis 2019, Carbon Neutral depuis 2017, et Public Benefit Corporation (Entreprise √† Mission) depuis 2021.

column13: European Master Data Regional Functional Expert F/M/X
column15:
Job Description:

Segment: Royal Canin

Location: Aimargues

Contract: Permanent

The European Master Data Regional Functional Expert is a key enabler for delivering the Royal Canin strategy. It impacts the way we market, sell and distribute our products and enables the execution and strengthening of our current business model. Consequently, Royal Canin has defined Data Management as a strategic transformation area to support our growth.

The European Master Data Regional Functional Expert (RFE) is member of the European Supply Chain Planning Team and a key function in the new MDM Organization.

  • Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Business Administration or related field with at least 5 years business related experience is preferred
  • Proven experience In data management, preferably In a data management role
  • Fluent English, French as plus
  • Advanced skills in MS Office applications, particularly MS Excel, Information System qualification a plus
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a strong attention to detail
  • Ability to work independently, prioritize tasks and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills with the ability to collaborate effectively across diverse teams
  • Strong understanding of data management principles, data governance and data quality best practices
  • Proficiency in using data management tools and systems, such as ERP systems, data flow, data modelling, data propagation
  • Proficiency in database management systems (e.g., SQL, Oracle, SAP) and data integration tools Is a plus
  • Good knowledge of Supply Chain & APS Is a plus

1. Data Management

  • Deploy and enforce global data governance standards and procedures across Europe to ensure data integrity, consistency and compliance with regulatory requirements with the support of Global teams and Local MD Key users
  • Establish, enforce & coordinate the execution of workflow procedures to ensure timely population of master data elements
  • Be Accountable for the Regional product data quality (completeness, accuracy, on time, ‚Ä¶)
  • Define and Implement Key Performance Indicators measuring the Regional data quality and adherence to MDM processes
  • Ensure data integrity and accuracy by performing regular audits and validation checks to identify and resolve data discrepancies
  • Identify and resolve data quality issues in a timely manner to minimize impact on business operations
  • Oversee the creation, maintenance and accuracy of master data records in the organization‚Äôs database and systems
  • Back up the European Master Data Admin in creating, updating and maintaining master data records in accordance with established procedures and standards

2. Community of Practice

  • Create and animate the EU MDM Community of Practice (20-30 Key Users across Europe)
  • Provide guidance and support to key users on proper data entry best practices, data standards and system functionality
  • Develop and deliver training materials and documentation to educate key users on data management processes and procedures
  • Foster a culture of data stewardship and accountability across the organization
  • Train local MD Key users

3. System Maintenance and Support

  • Be, as RFE, key contact to collaborate with DT teams to configure and maintain master data management systems and tools within an agreed Service Level Agreement
  • Provide technical support and troubleshooting assistance to users experiencing data-related issues

4. Process Optimization & Continuous Improvement

  • Maintain comprehensive documentation of data processes, standards and procedures
  • Streamline data management processes and workflows to improve efficiency and effectiveness
  • Engage with the Global Item MDM Team in CIP/new tool implementation (analyse, design, develop, test, deploy)
  • Collaborate with stakeholders to define and implement system enhancements and process improvements

5. Data Analysis

  • Assist in data analysis and reporting activities to support business decision-making and strategic initiatives
  • You will work in a multicultural environment (more than 40 nationalities) and where your dog will be welcomed by more than 100 other Associates‚Äô dogs at the office!¬†¬†¬†
  • You will work in a unique campus, which gathers more than 800 Associates working for: the international HQ, the French subsidiary, two laboratories, a kennel and a cattery with more than 200 cats & dogs, and finally the most important factory of the Royal Canin group¬†¬†¬†
  • A unique and ideal work environment to become the leader in health through nutrition for cats and dogs!¬†¬†
  • You will evolve in the heart of an innovative production plant that will challenge you, on a daily basis¬†¬†

Royal Canin's CSR commitments, to build a better world for tomorrow:¬†¬†

  • Since 2015, no waste to landfill is made by the 16 Royal Canin factories in the world¬†
  • All Royal Canin products manufactured in Europe are ISO 14001 certified from design to factory gate¬†
  • Since 2017, Royal Canin has supported the K-DOG program of the Curie Institute, which trains dogs to detect breast cancer via olfaction.¬†

Mars is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. If you need assistance or an accommodation during the application process because of a disability, it is available upon request. The company is pleased to provide such assistance, and no applicant will be penalized as a result of such a request.

column15:
About OCUS

In the digital age, images are a crucial driving force for large companies, along with effective search and seamless payment. But scaling operations for high coverage, quality, and customer experience can be an expensive and time-consuming challenge.

That‚Äôs where OCUS comes in. As an AI company, we provide all-in-one solutions that handle professional photography creation, automated quality control and post-production.

Our clients‚Äô resounding successes inspire us to aim even higher‚Ä¶Experiencing an increase of over 25% in conversion rates, up to 88% saved images with our QA and editing AI tool, and up to 30% product coverage across apps and websites.

So why wait? Join us today and be a driving force behind the future of imagery!
column38:
Founded in 2016, OCUS produces high-quality, custom visual content at scale for international brands. To do so, they rely on a global community of over 20,000 highly-qualified photographers and image creators. Product-driven, they use state of the art tech to make the whole process seamless both for brands and image creators.

Today, they deliver 4000 photoshootings each week in 120+ countries, for customers such as UberEats, Grubhub, Radisson, Booking.com.
By investing constantly in R&D and new technologies, they make intelligent content that reaches the right audience at the right time. They have closed a 20M‚Ç¨/$24M investment in March 2021 to further invest in product development and engineering while expanding its market presence worldwide.

Four years ago, they were three people sitting at one desk. Today, the team is made of 100 passionate people from 20 nationalities, working from Paris, New York, Singapore.
column50:
Our hiring process

Here‚Äôs a glimpse into our hiring process, which is designed to help us find the best talent while being fair and accessible:

  • First, a screening call with our hiring manager

  • Then a business case that will take no more than three hours to complete. Once you‚Äôve submitted your work, we‚Äôll provide you with feedback during a team review

  • If we like what we hear, time for the reference check

  • Lastly, you‚Äôll be invited to a culture-fit interview and meet our nerdy AND sweet CEO before extending a (great) offer ;)

We‚Äôre committed to providing equal opportunities to all candidates. If you have a medical condition or specific needs that require adjustments to our process, please let us know. We want to ensure that you have every chance to succeed, and we‚Äôll work with you to make any necessary adjustments.

column15:
L'√©quipe Smart Data

En tant que Consultant¬∑e Data Analyst, tu seras int√©gr√©¬∑e √† l‚Äô√©quipe Smart Data dont la mission est d‚Äôaider ses clients √† tirer profit des technologies les plus innovantes pour valoriser leurs donn√©es. De l‚Äôacquisition √† la restitution, tu interviens sur chaque √©tape du processus d‚Äôaide √† la d√©cision.

Descriptif du poste

Tu participeras aux missions de conseil et d‚Äôexpertise afin de contribuer √† l‚Äôatteinte des objectifs majeurs de nos clients et contribueras √† la r√©alisation de projets tels que :

‚ö°Ô∏è Le pilotage de l‚Äôactivit√© Worldwide d‚Äôun acteur majeur des cosm√©tiques pour le suivi de l‚Äôempreinte des diff√©rentes marques sur les diff√©rents m√©dias et r√©seaux sociaux

‚ö°Ô∏è L‚Äôanalyse des donn√©es fournisseurs pour suivre la performance et la gestion des contrats avec les diff√©rentes entreprises.

‚ö°Ô∏è La mise en place de Dashboards de gestion des comp√©tences pour aider les services RH dans la gestion des formations et la capitalisation des connaissances de l‚Äôentreprise

üßöüèª¬†Our Data team

The Data team at Joko is turning mountains of data into actionable insights for all the teams! The Data team is part of our Operations department led by Quentin, our COO, and our mission is to empower the company to make informed decisions.

More specifically, the team‚Äôs responsibilities are:

  • Data for Business: We create top-notch reports and tools, making it easy for teams to dive into data and excel in their decision-making.

  • Help our stakeholders with the best data stack: We load and transform data, automate reports, and continuously improve our data stack. This allows teams to use valuable insights built on robust and scalable foundations.

  • Spread the data culture: At Joko, we have a strong engineering and tech culture across all teams, making it an ideal environment for our Data team to have a significant impact. We provide support and training on data tools to our stakeholders, and by closely collaborating with them, we ensure that our solutions align perfectly with their operational needs.

üéØ What You Will Do

As a Data Analyst, you will have a cross-functional role and collaborate closely with teams to understand our data and develop insights.

  • Deep-dive analyses: You will explore and analyse data to uncover trends, patterns, and potential issues that will help in the decision-making processes across all teams.

  • Reporting and Data Visualization: You will participate in creating content, such as dashboards and charts, using our data visualization tool. You will be involved in defining the report‚Äôs content and constructing dashboards and charts to effectively communicate data-driven findings to stakeholders.

  • Data loading and transformation: You will be involved in loading and transforming the data as we have a ‚Äúfull stack‚Äù approach in Data at Joko. Of course, you will get some help on Data Engineering parts but you will be involved in the entire lifecycle of our data.

  • Interactions with stakeholders: You will work hand-in-hand with them to understand their needs, collect their feedback, and also evangelize data usage to help them make smarter choices.

  • Continuous Learning and Improvement: As ‚Äúnever stop learning‚Äù is one of our values, you will grow along the way and learn how to use analytical methods and the different tools that we use (and will use) in our data stack.

üßöüèª¬†Our Data team

The Data team at Joko is turning mountains of data into actionable insights for all the teams! The Data team is part of our Operations department led by Quentin, our COO, and our mission is to empower the company to make informed decisions.

More specifically, the team‚Äôs responsibilities are:

  • Data for Business: We create top-notch reports and tools, making it easy for teams to dive into data and excel in their decision-making.

üéØ What You Will Do

You will be the key partner of the Finance team when it comes to computing, analyzing, and automating financial documents.

  • Continuous improvement and refreshing of our financial files: On a monthly basis, you will help the Finance team update our P&L and cash statements.

  • Deep-dive analyses: You will conduct investigations and analyze data to uncover trends, patterns, and potential issues that will assist the Finance team in decision-making and improving models.

  • Automation and robustness of our financials: You will work on enriching our finance-related content in our data visualization tool. Our goal is to gradually make our P&L and forecasts available in this tool. The robustness of these improvements will be key to ensuring that our financial metrics are reliable.

  • Data loading and transformation: You will be involved in loading and transforming data as we have a ‚Äúfull stack‚Äù approach in Data at Joko. You will receive assistance with Data Engineering tasks, but you will be involved in the entire lifecycle of our data.

  • Accuracy and granularity of our forecast: You will work on the forecast of our P&L by developing predictive models for future planning. The accuracy and granularity of these models will be critical to bring our reporting to the next level.

  • Interactions with stakeholders: You will collaborate closely with senior stakeholders such as Joko‚Äôs CFO and our founders. You will also work with other teams such as B2B teams when it comes to revenue-related analyses.

  • Sharing and operationalization of financials: You will work on making the data accessible, generating targets for the team to pursue. You will also build frameworks based on data to assist the teams in their decision-making process (for instance, this includes using our data to identify and quantify opportunities related to revenue or cost).

REJOINS L'EQUIPE CORE DATA PRODUCT DE DECATHLON

L‚Äô√©quipe Core Data Product Decathlon expose des enrichissements et des agr√©gation de donn√©es avec un haut niveau de qualit√© permettant √† chaque entit√© de les comprendre et de les utiliser facilement (single point of truth).
