column15:
Unleash Your Potential at L‚ÄôOr√©al‚Äôs Beauty Tech!

For more than a century, L‚ÄôOr√©al has devoted itself solely to one business: Beauty. Present in 150 countries across five continents and with ‚Ç¨42 billion consolidated sales, L‚ÄôOr√©al is the global industry leader. With 37 global beauty brands across four divisions, L‚ÄôOr√©al offers beauty for each covering all beauty categories and catering to all beauty desires. With the acquisition of the Australian brand Aƒìsop in 2023, the Group continues to expand its portfolio through targeted acquisitions as part of its drive to create the future of beauty.

Today, L‚ÄôOr√©al includes more than 2,000 tech positions and is constantly growing. Beauty Tech is changing the game and leading the shift towards new consumer realities and a digital disruption. Championing Beauty Tech, we invent the beauty of the future while becoming the company of the future.

Beauty Tech is how we know our consumers intimately, augmenting their beauty journeys with unparalleled diverse and sustainable experiences. Beauty Tech equips the Group with the key assets it needs to conquer this new world, where Tech has become strategic. With this ambition, L‚ÄôOr√©al continues to recruit diverse, innovative, skilled and passionate minds in different tech domains such as Data, Digital, Cloud, Cyber Security, IT Architecture, DevOps, Applications and Infrastructure.

YOUR FUTURE TEAM

L‚ÄôOr√©al Master Data IT team is still at its early age, but already engaged in significant development and role expansion, bearing major ambitions!

Today, our Team already manage Product and Finance Master Data, globally at Group level, for both our factories and market sales activities, worldwide.

In close partnership with Data & Analytics Governance Organization, we are now engaged in building solutions for more Master Data to be managed at Group level, from various Data Domains, such as, for example, Retail Point of Sales (Commerce), or Websites Repository (Digital Marketing), a list rapidly expanding.

But such initiatives do not only require Master Data Management capabilities and skills: MDs are also requiring Analytics capabilities. It is in this perspective that we are seeking for our Master Data Analytics Lead, accountable for proposing and delivering Analytics solutions contributing to Master Data Management in the following 3 configurations:

  1. In full responsibility for master data consistency & quality checks solutions , use cases triggering MS Power BI on Tibco EBX platform tables (mono source MDM),
  2. In full responsibility also for master data end-to-end interfaces monitoring solutions , use cases requiring MS Power BI on ELK platform (multi-source applications connected to MDM),
  3. In accompaniment of other IT Analytics teams for all their usage of master data and referential in analytics data models serving Analytics Use Cases , on Google Cloud Platform environment.


Join a young & dynamic team: two third of IT Master Data members have been now for less than 2 years in their current position, one fourth of our job positions were newly created within the 2 last years !

What a day in the life of the IT Master Data team looks like:

Reporting directly to IT Master Data Director , as MD Analytics Lead, you will:

  • Coordinate: Represent Master Data Analytics, facing the various Data Domains exercising Data Governance, and their solutions owners as well as their key users spread across many business units / Represent Master Data Analytics, facing other IT teams : Data Factory team in charge of Data Platform, and all other IT teams in charge of MDM source or consuming applications.
  • Organize : Analyze business needs, in collaboration with Applications Owners, for any enhancement or new project subject of Master Data Analytics use cases / Frame and design IT solutions to build as answers to these needs / Participate to the design, the build and the evolution of inbound data processing from sources, the modeling of datamarts and queries, reports & visualizations contributing to these cases / Guarantee global consistency, and respect of Data Factory guidelines for these MD Analytics solutions.
  • Build : Assess and validates expert profiles who will contribute to development and maintenance of MD Analytics / Guarantee development and project management down to deliverables quality and go-live reliability / Ensure respect of plannings, budgets and priorities / Bear responsibility of global consistency of Analytics MD architecture
  • Support: Be responsible for support of Master Data Analytics live solutions / Coordinate the support organization to live users


THIS IS WHAT YOU WILL NEED TO SUCCEED!

First and foremost, we love people that are curious, collaborative, eager to have an impact, proactive and who value innovation, autonomy, and team spirit.

Secondly, in this specific position, it will be important for you to have:

  • An engineer in Information Technology, you have a minimum of 5 years of experience in development, then project management for Analytics or Business Intelligence solutions. You already have proven capability to select and manage BI/Analytics developers, either external or internal, as well as to frame, organize and manage projects in this field.
  • You bring a solid BI/Analytics expertise, based on an effective practice through each of the lifecycle steps of a project [analysis of needs, specifications, development, validation through unitary & volume testing, documentation, support to production go-live until stabilization], experimented on following technologies : Google Cloud platform, Big Query and/or SQL, MS Power BI, data cataloging, data modeling, data analytics processing, data exploration, data querying, data visualization skills (soft and hard).
  • You can exchange fluently in English on your topics in an international context, among people from many nationalities, both orally (phone, videoconference, on-site) and by written (documents, mails, chat)
  • You may bring as an option technical knowledge about SAP Business Object, ELK, TIBCO, Looker, SAP Fiori, APIs.


LET US GIVE YOU 6 OTHER REASONS TO JOIN US!

Joining L‚ÄôOr√©al means joining a company that:
  1. Invests in Tech and positions its Tech teams at the heart of its digital transformation strategy.
  2. Allows its employees to have a real impact, to test their ideas, to innovate and to build our future.
  3. Offers a Hybrid Work Policy: 3 Days in Office, 2 Days Work from Home
  4. Provides many benefits: VIP staff shop offering our products at a preferential rate, a company restaurant & gym, 60% reimbursement of transportation subscription, a work council offering lots of employee discounts (social & cultural activities, holiday vouchers etc.) and much more!
  5. Provides a powerful and innovative HR policy : dynamic mobility policy, significant investment in employee training, regular re-evaluation of remuneration, numerous innovative HR measures: Time Savings Account, paternity leave, Citizen Day, etc.
  6. Delivers a n Equal Opportunity Employer and take pride in a diverse environment. We would love to find out more about you as a candidate and we do not discriminate in recruitment, hiring, training, promotion, or other employment practices. The beauty we find in our differences gives us the freedom to go beyond. That‚Äôs the beauty of L‚ÄôOr√©al.


GOOD TO KNOW: THE RECRUITMENT PROCESS
  1. Interview with HR
  2. Interview with the hiring manager
  3. Interview with the business leader


We will be delighted to exchange with you!

Want to learn more about L‚ÄôOr√©al Beauty Tech? C lick here.

column4:
ABOUT OPENSEE

Opensee provides instant big data analytics solutions to financial institutions. Our mission is to empower business users to autonomously exploit data at a scale and granularity never seen before in order to optimize risk management, trade execution, regulatory reporting and more.
Founded in 2015 by senior banking executives and big data technology experts, Opensee‚Äôs commercial traction exploded in 2020 with deployment in several Tier 1 financial institutions on critical use cases. To sustain that growth, we doubled our headcount that same year and are now expanding in London, NYC and Singapore.

WHAT‚ÄôS IN IT FOR YOU?

  • Develop expertise in one of the most advanced solution for risk aggregations
  • Work in a dynamic environment where innovation and creativity are highly value
  • Play a key role in strategic projects for international financial institutions
column13: Junior Implementation Engineer - Big Data & Analytics
column15:
WHAT ARE YOU GOING TO DO ?

This involves closely working with client‚Äôs internal teams to drive growth and address concerns efficiently:¬†

  • Integrate our solution in client infrastructure, at the multiple steps of the sales process (POC / Test / Production). Clients could use servers, VM, clouds (aws, azure, gcloud), and you must be able, with the help of the teams and our experience, to adapt to that,
  • In charge of data pipeline within Opensee Solution at clients from ingestion to vizualisation,
  • Fine tune the solution to ensure the best performances,
  • Support Client ingesting large quantities of data in a timely manner,
  • Supporting client with every product features,
  • Troubleshoot the system with every problem encountered on all product aspects (deployment, component wealthness, API)¬† during integration project on all client environments ( Staging, UAT, Production)¬†
  • Ensure client production and SLA respect,
  • Manage the SaaS platform offered by Opensee to its clients,

We also have a CLI written in go, to deploy and manage our platform on bare-metal servers and kubernetes (something like aws-cli). Your role will be to improve, expand and stabilize this CLI, that is used by us, and our clients.Y ou will also take part of the Ops part of our infrastructure, that is used for CI/CD/CT and demo.

Keywords: BigData,¬† linux, bash , python pandas, ops, devops, database, docker, kubernetes

Opensee has decided to tackle one of the major challenges facing financial institutions: making the most informed decisions as quickly and easily as possible.

How can they do that? By exploiting all of their data.

Opensee, with its finance and deep tech experts, offers banks and asset managers simple, instant access to their massive data (in Tera) and breaks the status quo:

  • By breaking down silos,

  • By establishing solid partnerships with its customers to develop the most appropriate solutions.

Today, this fast-growing international fintech offers a high-performance solution to major financial institutions in Paris, London and New York.

column4:
ABOUT OPENSEE

Opensee provides instant big data analytics solutions to financial institutions. Our mission is to empower business users to autonomously exploit data at a scale and granularity never seen before in order to optimise risk management, trade execution, regulatory reporting and more.
Founded in 2015 by senior banking executives and big data technology experts, Opensee‚Äôs commercial traction exploded in 2020 with deployment in several Tier 1 financial institutions on critical use cases. To sustain that growth, we doubled our headcount that same year and are now expanding in London, NYC and Singapore.
¬†

WHAT‚ÄôS IN IT FOR YOU?

  • Develop expertise in one of the most advanced solutions for risk aggregations
  • Work in a dynamic environment where innovation and creativity are highly value
  • Benefit from a wealth of development opportunities as we constantly seek new talents to join us, and support our growth
column13: Front-End developer - Big Data & Analytics Fintech
column15:
WHAT ARE YOU GOING TO DO?¬†

You will join the Front-End team which is responsible for the development of user interfaces dealing with large volumes of data, where performance and user experience are important, by applying modern development practices in an Agile team.
¬†What you will take part in:

  • Integrating new features in an Angular and React Front-End (pivot table, graph, user and groups management).
  • Development of a vscode extension for writing python calculators.
column36: IT / Digital, FinTech / InsurTech, Big Data
column38:
Opensee has decided to tackle one of the major challenges facing financial institutions: making the most informed decisions as quickly and easily as possible.

How can they do that? By exploiting all of their data.

Opensee, with its finance and deep tech experts, offers banks and asset managers simple, instant access to their massive data (in Tera) and breaks the status quo:

  • By breaking down silos,
  • By challenging existing processes,
  • By establishing solid partnerships with its customers to develop the most appropriate solutions.

Today, this fast-growing international fintech offers a high-performance solution to major financial institutions in Paris, London and New York.

column4:
Pourquoi rejoindre MeltOne ?¬†

Notre structure √† taille humaine est un cadre parfait pour te permettre d‚Äô√©voluer rapidement et d‚Äôintervenir sur des missions de plus en plus responsabilisantes chez le client mais aussi en interne.

Nous t‚Äôoffrons un cadre de travail respectueux de ton √©quilibre de vie professionnelle et personnelle. Nous avons une politique flex remote, la r√®gle c‚Äôest qu‚Äôil n‚Äôy a pas de r√®gle, tu travailles depuis notre super bureau dans le 8√®me avec une vue imprenable sur la ville, depuis les bureaux du client ou depuis ton domicile selon l‚Äôorganisation¬† des projets.

Tu as l‚Äôopportunit√© de te former tout au long de ta carri√®re chez MeltOne (e-learning, formations externes, ateliers internes, petit-d√©j innovation‚Ä¶) afin de progresser, d‚Äô√©voluer et de passer tes certifications outil.¬†

Chez MeltOne Advisory : excellence, partage, bienveillance et initiative sont les valeurs que nous portons fi√®rement. WANT TO KNOW MORE ABOUT OUR BIG TECH TRANSFORMATION?

L‚ÄôOr√©al is present in 130 countries on five continents. For more than a century, L‚ÄôOr√©al has devoted itself solely to one business: beauty; it is now the industry world leader with ‚Ç¨42 billion consolidated sales.

Today, L‚ÄôOr√©al includes more than 2000 tech positions and it‚Äôs constantly growing. Especially with our ambition to become the #1 BeautyTech company, meaning inventing the beauty of the future while becoming the company of the future.

BeautyTech will equip the Group with the key assets it needs to conquer this new world, where Tech has become strategic.

To achieve this ambition, L‚ÄôOr√©al needs to continue recruiting diverse, innovative, skilled and passionate minds in different tech domains such as Data, Digital, Cloud, Cyber Security, IT Architecture, DevOps, Applications and Infrastructure.

LET US INTRODUCE YOU THE TEAM !

Join our Europe Zone Data Analytics Team, established in 2023 as part of L‚ÄôOr√©al‚Äôs Data & Analytics transformation initiative. Our mission is to ensure that data analytics initiatives across Europe generate the highest return on investment.

We achieve this by partnering with various Europe Zone Business Functions (e.g., Commerce, Supply Chain, Digital & Marketing), Divisions (Luxe, Consumer Products, Dermatological Beauty, Professional Products), and local Hubs/Markets to select identify and deliver the most profitable data use cases.

Our responsibilities encompass overseeing a diverse portfolio of data analytics projects, streamlining our data analytics processes, and working closely with the IT Data Factory to make it happen.

INTERESTED?

THIS IS WHAT YOU WILL DO IN NUTSHELL!

As the Data Analytics PMO Manager, you will work closely with the Head of Data Analytics Europe, Heads of Business Functions and Divisions at the Europe Zone level, and Heads of Data & Analytics in European Hubs/Markets, to drive the data analytics strategy and governance, ensuring efficient operation of data analytics initiatives across Europe.

Responsibilities:

  1. Project Management:
    1. Execute the data analytics roadmap in alignment with strategic goals.
    2. Monitor data analytics projects to ensure timely delivery within scope and budget.
    3. Provide guidance on resource allocation and capacity planning.
    4. Identify and address project risks and issues, implementing mitigation strategies.
  2. Analytics Governance:
    1. Organize and facilitate data analytics operational and strategic committees.
    2. Promote alignment of data analytics initiatives with business objectives.
    3. Ensure effective communication and coordination among stakeholders.
  3. Operating Model:
    1. Formalize and monitor implementation of the data analytics operating model.
    2. Optimize data analytics workflows and methodologies.
    3. Maintain documentation related to data analytics organization and processes.


STILL INTERESTED?

THIS IS WHAT YOU WILL NEED TO SUCCEED!

  • 5+ years of experience in data analytics, project management, or related roles.
  • Excellent communication, leadership, and stakeholder management skills.
  • Project management certifications (e.g., PMP) preferred.
  • Knowledge of data management principles and frameworks (e.g., DAMA-DMBOK2) is a plus.
  • Experience in the beauty or consumer goods industry is a plus.


WAIT, THERE IS MORE! LET US GIVE YOU 4 OTHER REASONS TO JOIN US!

Joining L‚ÄôOr√©al means joining a company that:

  1. Invests in Tech and positions its Tech teams at the heart of its digital transformation strategy.
  2. Allows its employees to have a real impact, to test their ideas, to innovate and to build our future.
  3. Has a powerful and innovative HR policy: a very dynamic mobility policy, significant investment in employee training, regular re-evaluation of remuneration, numerous innovative HR measures: Time Savings Account, paternity leave, Citizen Day, etc.
  4. Has chosen to uphold strong values and to be particularly advanced from a social and environmental point of view (strong diversity and inclusion policy, L‚ÄôOr√©al for the Future program, commitment to numerous communities, etc.).

The L‚ÄôOr√©al Group is convinced that difference is a deep source of wealth, that allows everyone to grow, to challenge themselves and to go further.

We strongly encourage everyone to always dare and never censor themselves. Skills can always be learnt.

We will be delighted to exchange with you!

Ready to build the future of L‚ÄôOr√©al together? Apply now!
column38:
The desire for beauty has existed since the beginning of humanity. It‚Äôs a universal aspiration which crosses time, countries, and cultures.

Beauty is a powerful force that moves us.

We know that beauty is more than just looking good.
Beauty gives us confidence in who we are, in who we want to be, and in our relationships with others.

For over a century we have been dedicated to one sole vocation: creating beauty.
We remain true to the pioneering spirit of our founder and enjoy the unwavering support of his family, who have always accompanied our development.

Our goal is to offer each and every person around the world the best of beauty‚ÄØin terms of quality, efficacy, safety, sincerity and responsibility to satisfy all beauty needs and desires in their infinite diversity.

Because beauty is a permanent quest, we harness the power of our innovation to continually enhance the performance of our products and services.
Because we value diversity,‚ÄØwe leverage each of our brands to celebrate all expressions of beauty.

Because we strive to be exemplary with a long-term vision, we anchor our actions in our strong values and demanding ethical principles.

And because we are the global leader in beauty, we are aware that‚ÄØeverything we do can have a meaningful impact.
Therefore:

We act to shape the future of beauty‚ÄØby leveraging the best of science and technology, increasingly inspired by nature.

We act to drive social innovation‚ÄØby offering the best working conditions, training, and social protection for our employees.

We act to build a business with inclusivity at its heart‚ÄØby ensuring we are as diverse as the people we serve.

We act to nurture‚ÄØlasting partnerships‚ÄØwith our clients and suppliers‚ÄØbased on mutual trust and collaboration.

We act to create value for all our shareholders, by sustaining a robust business model.

We act to champion the cause of women‚ÄØand to strengthen the communities with which we engage.

We act to protect the beauty of the planet‚ÄØby fighting climate change, respecting biodiversity and preserving natural resources.

The desire for beauty has existed since the beginning of humanity. It‚Äôs a universal aspiration which crosses time, countries, and cultures.

Beauty is a powerful force that moves us.

We know that beauty is more than just looking good.
Beauty gives us confidence in who we are, in who we want to be, and in our relationships with others.

For over a century we have been dedicated to one sole vocation: creating beauty.
We remain true to the pioneering spirit of our founder and enjoy the unwavering support of his family, who have always accompanied our development.

Our goal is to offer each and every person around the world the best of beauty‚ÄØin terms of quality, efficacy, safety, sincerity and responsibility to satisfy all beauty needs and desires in their infinite diversity.

Because beauty is a permanent quest, we harness the power of our innovation to continually enhance the performance of our products and services.
Because we value diversity,‚ÄØwe leverage each of our brands to celebrate all expressions of beauty.

Because we strive to be exemplary with a long-term vision, we anchor our actions in our strong values and demanding ethical principles.

And because we are the global leader in beauty, we are aware that‚ÄØeverything we do can have a meaningful impact.
Therefore:

We act to shape the future of beauty‚ÄØby leveraging the best of science and technology, increasingly inspired by nature.

We act to drive social innovation‚ÄØby offering the best working conditions, training, and social protection for our employees.

We act to build a business with inclusivity at its heart‚ÄØby ensuring we are as diverse as the people we serve.

We act to nurture‚ÄØlasting partnerships‚ÄØwith our clients and suppliers‚ÄØbased on mutual trust and collaboration.

We act to create value for all our shareholders, by sustaining a robust business model.

We act to champion the cause of women‚ÄØand to strengthen the communities with which we engage.

We act to protect the beauty of the planet‚ÄØby fighting climate change, respecting biodiversity and preserving natural resources.

column15:
Qui sommes-nous ?

¬†

Artefact est une nouvelle g√©n√©ration de cabinet de conseil sp√©cialis√©e en Data dont plus de 1500 employ√©s r√©partis sur 25 pays ont pour mission d‚Äôaccompagner la transformation chez nos clients.

Nous offrons une large gamme de solutions data-driven, que nous adaptions aux besoins sp√©cifiques de nos clients, que ce soit des projets IA pour l'automatisation des process internes √† chaque √©tape de leur cha√Æne de valeur, la cr√©ation d'exp√©riences consommateurs innovantes et personnalis√©es, le conseil en strat√©gie data et marketing digital jusqu'√† la gestion du mix-m√©dia et plus encore !

La performance de nos services data repose sur une r√©elle expertise technologique en Intelligence Artificielle et des comp√©tences m√©tiers acquises aupr√®s de plus de 1000 clients dans le monde, tels que AccorHotels, Orange, Carrefour, Engie, Emirates, Deutsche Telekom, Monoprix‚Ä¶¬†

La force d'Artefact repose sur un mix unique d'atouts: une connaise des technologies de pointe en data, des m√©thodes agiles permettant de d√©livrer tr√®s rapidement les projets et des √©quipes compos√©es des meilleurs experts dans leurs domaines (business consultants, data analysts, data scientists, ing√©nieurs data‚Ä¶).

¬†

Votre Mission :

¬†

En √©quipe avec des sp√©cialistes data et encadr√© par un s√©nior/manager, le/ la consultant(e) veille √† la bonne ex√©cution des projets clients. Il/elle accompagne nos clients sur des projets end-to-end et adopte donc un r√¥le strat√©gique et op√©rationnel. Son ultime objectif est de concevoir et impl√©menter des solutions data en r√©ponse aux probl√©matiques business de ses clients. Ses principales missions sont :

¬†

  • Cadrage des projets : interviews clients et partenaires, mise en place de workshops,¬† pr√©paration des uses cases, des MVP‚Ä¶

¬†

  • Construction de Roadmaps, d'analyses data-driven avec l‚Äô√©quipe projet et conception d'infrastructures en collaboration avec nos experts

  • Formulation et pr√©sentation de recommandations strat√©giques pour le client

¬†

  • Orchestration du bon d√©roulement du projet, en appliquant le cas √©ch√©ant les m√©thodes agiles (sprints planning et reviews, backlog refinement, d√©mos, etc.)

¬†

  • R√¥le de Product Owner sur des cas d'usages Data/IA, depuis la phase de cadrage jusqu'√† la mise en production

¬†

  • Contribution active au d√©veloppement d‚ÄôArtefact: identification d'√©ventuelles opportunit√©s commerciales, contribution aux publications de travaux de recherche, recrutement de futurs Artefactors.

¬†

Job Description:

A position for a Data Transport / Data Integration Specialist has just arised within Airbus Defence & Space in Toulouse.

The successful candidate will join TDDT Data Transport.

As a specialist for Data Transportation you will take responsibility for the transport and transformation of data from multiple data sources including Business Systems, Engineering Systems, Machines, Drones, etc. using Middleware Technologies.

The successful candidate will work alongside a multi-disciplinary team of experts working in classical and agile project management methodologies. Depending on the projects the applicant will have an end-to-end accountability for the development and the service. You will make the data fly inside Airbus Defence & Space and also from and to outside partners, customers or governments!

Your working environment:

Global capital of aeronautics and European capital for space research, Toulouse is a dynamic city of the southwest of France served by an international airport. Ideally located between the Mediterranean sea and the Atlantic ocean and close to the Pyrenees mountains, it offers plenty of options for outdoor activities!

How we care for you:

  • Financial rewards: Attractive salary, agreements on success and profit sharing schemes, employee savings plan abounded by Airbus and employee stock purchase plan on a voluntary basis.

  • Work / Life Balance:¬† Extra days-off for special occasions, holiday transfer option, a Staff council offering many social, cultural and sport activities and other services.

  • Wellbeing / Health: Complementary health insurance coverage (disability, invalidity, death). Depending on the site: health services center, concierge services, gym, carpooling application.

  • Individual development: Great upskilling opportunities and development prospects¬† with unlimited access to +10.000 e-learning courses to develop your employability, certifications, expert career path, accelerated development programmes, national and international mobility.

At Airbus, we support you to work, connect and collaborate more easily and flexibly.¬† ¬† Wherever possible, we foster flexible working arrangements to stimulate innovative thinking.

A. ¬† Responsibilities¬†

  • The jobholder is responsible of all the integration activities related to his/her area/technology of expertise associated to Data Management Use Cases at company level¬†

  • He / she is acting as single point of contact for the project manager who has requested data integration support¬†

  • He / she is taking the lead on the activities related to data integration from design to deployment, including the testing in integration platform of the provided solution as part of the User Acceptance Tests of the Project.

  • He / she is setting-up & engaging close collaboration with associated Operation Manager to guarantee that the new data integration will be properly maintained and is in line with current performance/committed SLA

  • He / she shall ensure close communication & relationship with Digital Project Managers jointly with Product Owner

¬†B. ¬† Dimensions

  • Interface with Project Managers inside Digital Organization, with data architecture team and with business when is needed for clarification purposes

  • Close collaboration with TDD actors such as Data Governance and Data Engineers.

C. ¬† Main activities

¬†The mission will include the following activities identified at the time of launch but not limited to:

  • Integration activities(design, configure, develop, test and deploy) inside his/her product to accomplish requests from the Product Owner

  • Define the integration tasks associated to new development related to new Use Cases or needs raised by associated Product Owner

  • Supporting UATs and Deployment activities associated to new developments in close alignment with Service Delivery Manager¬†

  • Support Data Integration Platform performance analysis

D. ¬† Outputs

  • Information Flows up to date with the new data flows developed and deployed inside Project ARD or dedicated document if needed

  • Data Integration Platform SLR up to date

  • Configuration Mgt documentation

  • UATs deliverables in alignment with Project Manager

  • Deployment plan and associated acceptance criteria

  • Data Transport technologies metrics

  • Technical advice on architecture and integrations at task level

¬†

E. Skills and competences

  • Mandatory

    • Over 5 years of relevant work experience as a Data Integration Engineer¬†

    • Over years of hands on experience in building ESB and/or ETL/ELT solutions/integrations for large scale data pipelines

    • Experience in handling data from a variety of sources like csv, json, xml, relational databases and so on

    • Experience in databases (relational and NoSQL) and Infrastructure management at administration level

    • Deep experience in SQL and NoSQL languages programming¬†

    • Deep experience in programming languages related to data integration (Python, Flask, Node, JavaScript, Express ‚Ä¶)

    • API based services technologies experience would be a plus

    • Experience in developing technical and support documentation, translate business requirements and needs into reporting and models

    • Knowledge on DevOps methods and tools (some experience would be a plus)

    • Languages: English and French at negotiation level

  • Nice to Have

    • Project management with key focus on agile methodologies

    • Basic knowledge about Data Analytics

    • Basic experience in IT Service Management principles¬†

    • Cloud integration experience

Not a 100% match? No worries! Airbus supports your personal growth with customized development solutions.

Take your career to a new level and apply online now!

Ogury is¬†a global adtech company¬†that delivers Personified Advertising solutions grounded in privacy to brands, agencies and publishers by focusing on targeting personas, not people.

¬†

We deliver relevant audiences at scale and on quality publisher inventory thanks to¬†our exclusive data, which is meticulously collected and crafted from millions of¬†self-declared customer surveys, enriched with billions of impactful data points, and refined by AI.¬†This results in audience insights and performance not available through any other AdTech platform.

¬†

Founded in 2014, Ogury is a global organization with¬†a diverse team of 500+ people¬†across 17 countries.

¬†

At Ogury,¬†our vision unites us all. But we know that it takes people from all walks of life to come together and make it happen. We¬†embrace and celebrate what makes us different, creating a unique and winning culture where everyone¬†feels safe, has access to¬†the same opportunities, and is excited about bringing their¬†most authentic self to work. Everyday.¬†

¬†

Together we‚Äôre changing the face of adtech with values that inspire excellence, standards that encourage a leadership mindset, and an inclusive workplace where¬†Ogurians are engaged and know they belong.

About the Role:

As the Vice President of Data Science and Analytics at Ogury, you will play a pivotal role in driving the strategic direction and execution of our data science, analytics, and insights initiatives. You will lead, develop, and grow a team of talented data scientists and data analysts and collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to develop native AI products, improve performance of existing algo offerings, and develop data-driven insights and advanced analytics solutions that enhance our existing products and services.

What you will be doing

  • Provide strategic leadership and vision for the data science team, aligning with the company's goals and objectives.
  • Be hands-on in the development of our data, ML, and AI products, including contribution to code and infrastructure.
  • Drive the development and execution of data science initiatives that deliver tangible business value and competitive advantage.
  • Oversee the design of the real-time algorithms and optimization models that drive advertiser outcomes and operate in large scale, low latency contexts
  • Develop and implement advanced analytics solutions and models to extract actionable insights from large and complex datasets.
  • Collaborate with senior leadership to define the data science roadmap and priorities, ensuring alignment with Ogury‚Äôs product strategy.
  • Lead, mentor, and inspire a team of data scientists, fostering a culture of innovation, collaboration, and excellence.
  • Recruit, onboard, and retain top talent, building a high-performing and diverse team.
  • Provide guidance and support for professional development and skill enhancement of team members.
  • Develop and implement advanced analytics solutions and models to extract actionable insights from large and complex datasets.
  • Utilize machine learning, statistical analysis, and other quantitative techniques to solve business problems and drive decision-making.
  • Stay abreast of emerging trends and technologies in data science and apply them to enhance Ogury's capabilities.
  • Partner with product, engineering, marketing, and sales teams to integrate data science capabilities into products and solutions.
  • Collaborate with stakeholders to identify opportunities for leveraging data to improve user experience, drive revenue growth, and optimize processes.
  • Communicate findings and recommendations to both technical and non-technical audiences, fostering data-driven decision-making across the organization.

    • About you

  • Experience within the AdTech or MarTech industry.
  • Proven track record of leadership and management in data science or analytics roles, preferably in a technology-driven environment.
  • Strong expertise in machine learning, statistical analysis, and data mining techniques, with experience applying them to real-world problems.
  • Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, Java, or Scala, and familiarity with data manipulation and visualization tools.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with diverse teams and influence stakeholders at all levels.
  • Demonstrated ability to think strategically, drive innovation, and translate business requirements into actionable data science solutions.

    • #LI-HP1 #LI-Hybrid

    Benefits vary by location but you can expect:

    Competitive salary

    Health Insurance via Willis Towers Watson.

    Flexible approach to working hours and location.

    Keeping our Ogurians happy and healthy is a priority for us, so we offer access to both physical and mental health and wellbeing benefits.

    Company family mutuelle.

    25 days holiday plus an extra 10 days.

    Look after your family with a life assurance plan.

    Daily lunch voucher.

    Modern and collaborative working space in central Paris.

    CSE benefits.

    At Ogury we are a group of creative thinkers and action-takers that thrive in a diverse and inclusive workplace.

column15:
About Decathlon

Decathlon aims to become the best sports digital platform and open ecosystem in the world. We want to enable customers to experience Decathlon through many local sport-centric experiences by connecting many third-party actors and services, in a secure and performant way.

Our digital teams in Lille, Paris, Amsterdam (and more‚Ä¶) which bring together more than 1500 collaborators are united to build and scale digital products with the aim to always deliver the best value to our users. With a presence in more than 70 countries, Decathlon is committed to innovation, sustainability, and customer satisfaction.

Decathlon is also working with 1500 production suppliers & 1 million indirect workers all over the world, 38 industrial processes.

Job Description

Decathlon is seeking a skilled and experienced Data Science & Analytics Manager to lead our Data purchase & performances team within the Industry department of the Supply Chain. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of leading and developing high-performing data teams. A plus, to have knowledge in transforming purchase domain.

Responsibilities

  • Lead and manage a multi competences team of Data Scientists, BI Engineers, Data governance, Data Analysts.
  • Provide technical guidance and mentorship to team members to foster their professional growth and development.
  • Develop and implement advanced statistical models and machine learning algorithms for costing optimization, purchase risk management.
  • Drive innovation and continuous improvement in data science methodologies and processes.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams (Business, Product, Engineering, Data) to understand business and technical requirements and prioritize data projects accordingly
  • Communicate insights and recommendations to senior leadership and stakeholders to support strategic decision-making.

Hard Skills

  • AI modeling and productionizing
  • Extensive experience in Python for data analysis, modeling, and automation.
  • Experience with data visualization tools such as Tableau, Power BI
  • Familiarity with database systems and querying languages (e.g., SQL) for data extraction and manipulation.
  • Deep understanding of supply chain concepts, including panel management, relationship management, performance management and risk management.

Soft Skills

  • Excellent leadership and team management skills with the ability to inspire and motivate others.
  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
  • Strategic thinking and problem-solving abilities to address complex business challenges.
  • Ability to thrive in a fast-paced and dynamic environment with changing priorities.
  • Customer-focused mindset with a commitment to delivering actionable insights and value to stakeholders.

Qualifications

Basic Qualifications

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Engineering, or related field.
  • Minimum of 4 years of experience in data analysis, statistical modeling, or related fields.
  • Demonstrated experience in leading and managing a team of data professionals.
  • English

Preferred Qualifications

  • Master's or Ph.D. degree in Data Science, Statistics, Operations Research, or related field.
  • Previous experience in purchase, retail or e-commerce industry is a plus.

Benefits

  • International environment
  • Freedom of choice of work tool (Mac, Windows)
  • Local project team and sharing with the global network (international route)
  • Upgrading of skills (diversity of projects, languages and technologies)
  • Internal and external training courses
  • Shareholders
  • Remote Friendly: 2 days/week
  • Monthly and quarterly premiums

Joining Decathlon means becoming part of a dynamic team dedicated to driving innovation and making a positive impact on the world of sports. If you are passionate about leveraging data science to optimize industry processes and lead a talented team of data professionals, we invite you to apply and be a part of our journey!

To apply, please submit your resume and cover letter (optional) detailing your relevant experience and why you are interested in leading Decathlon's Industrial Purchase Data team in the Industry department.

DECATHLON DIGITAL CONTEXT

What if technology allowed us to push the boundaries and take sports experiences to new levels? That's exactly our goal at Decathlon Digital! We are a team of 5,000+ experts in software engineering, product management, data, cloud, and cybersecurity, distributed across Paris, Lille, and Amsterdam. Together, we are creating the largest digital sports platform, leveraging tech innovation from design to value chain optimization, connected experiences and product second life.

Changing the game for good. We are in this for the love of sports. And like everything we love, we want it to last. That‚Äôs why we are embarking on a journey to create a more sustainable tech model, reducing our direct environmental impact while maintaining a safe, diverse, and inclusive space for all our people to learn and thrive together. Team up with us to design the digital future of sports.
column36: Mobile Apps, Software, Cyber Security, Sports, E-commerce, Mass Distribution
column38:
DECATHLON DIGITAL is the power engine of DECATHLON transformation. With the expertise of over 4 000 teammates based in Lille, Paris, and Amsterdam, committed to creating the largest digital sports platform, leveraging tech innovation from design to value chain optimization, connected experiences, and product second life.

At DECATHLON DIGITAL, we‚Äôre transforming global digital sports experiences to elevate how customers and employees sustainably play, train, and connect in more than 70 countries.

column13: Senior BW Data Engineer - SAP Analytics (f/m/d)
column15:
REJOINS L'√âQUIPE VALUE CHAIN BI SAP ANALYTICS

√Ä mi-chemin entre la DATA et la VALUE CHAIN, l'√©quipe SAP Analytics est charg√©e de mettre √† disposition l'ensemble des donn√©es n√©cessaires √† la VALUE CHAIN permettant une prise de d√©cision rapide et √©clair√©e.

Le p√©rim√®tre fonctionnel, allant de la production (usines) jusqu‚Äô√† la livraison des articles aux magasins/sites e-commerce, est immense et sert plusieurs milliers d‚Äôutilisateurs internes.

√Ä la r√©ception de donn√©es venant donc de plusieurs environnements (SAP, Data, ou diff√©rents syst√®mes op√©rationnels), les interactions avec les autres domaines sont nombreuses et riches d‚Äôapprentissages.

De notre c√¥t√©, nous sommes responsables de plusieurs outils : BW pour le stockage des donn√©es (Data Warehouse), Analysis For Office (AFO) et SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC) pour la restitution √† nos utilisateurs (Business Intelligence), SAP BI-IP et SAC Planning pour la planification et la simulation (Planning). Ces outils sont critiques pour nos utilisateurs car ils les utilisent au quotidien pour suivre leurs activit√©s, se piloter, et prioriser leurs actions.

L'√©quipe actuelle, compos√©e de 12 personnes, est jeune, motiv√©e, multiculturelle et multi-sites (France, Chine, Inde, Roumanie, Canada).

Dans le cadre de l‚Äôouverture d‚Äôun poste en interne, nous recrutons un-e Senior Data Engineer / D√©veloppeur BW, bas√©-e, √† Lille (Croix).

Contexte & Mission

Dans le cadre de l'√©volution de la BI pour la Supply Decathlon, nous continuons d‚Äôalimenter notre Data Warehouse de nouvelles donn√©es pour r√©pondre toujours davantage aux besoins de nos utilisateurs.

Pour cela, nous avons une √©quipe de d√©veloppement sp√©cialis√©e en BW 7.5.

Dans l'optique du renforcement de l'√©quipe, nous recherchons un d√©veloppeur ayant une exp√©rience significative dans le d√©veloppement et id√©alement avec des connaissances du monde SAP ou du Data Warehousing.

Int√©gr√© √† une √©quipe de d√©veloppement, tu auras pour mission :

De d√©velopper:

  • R√©diger des sp√©cifications techniques
  • Mod√©liser des flux BW (Datasources, Infopackages, ABAP/AMDP Transformations, DTPs, Infosources, aDSOs, Composite Providers)
  • D√©velopper de vues Hana (via Hana studio)
  • D√©velopper des queries BW, workbooks AFO pour la restitution aux utilisateurs
  • Optimiser les performances
  • D√©velopper dans le respect des bonnes pratiques
  • R√©aliser les tests unitaires
  • Challenger des choix techniques r√©alis√©s par les autres d√©veloppeurs

D‚Äôanimer des sujets organisationnels ou techniques au sein de l‚Äô√©quipe, comme par exemple:

  • Responsable du process agile
  • Responsabilit√© des environnements de d√©veloppement / test
  • Documentation
  • Standardisation

De collaborer avec les m√©tiers ci-dessous dans un environnement agile:

  • D‚Äôautres d√©veloppeurs (BW, SAP, BI, ‚Ä¶)
  • Des PM
  • Le Support
  • Des utilisateurs cl√©s et supports m√©tiers

Comp√©tences

  • A minima 5 ans d‚Äôexp√©rience dans le d√©veloppement avec un r√¥le organisationnel (ou la forte volont√© de le travailler)
  • Connaissance de la m√©thodologie agile
  • Technologies bonus: SAP BW / SAP HANA / SAP BI-IP / SAP BPC / SAC / SAC Planning

Savoir-Etre

  • Organis√© et sachant travailler en √©quipe
  • Bonne communication
  • Capacit√© √† jongler entre le court terme (livraison de d√©veloppements) et le long terme (organisation, structuration, ‚Ä¶)

Ce que nous offrons

  • 2 jours de t√©l√©travail par semaine ;
  • Possibilit√© de travailler dans l'un des bureaux de Decathlon Digital √† Lille, Paris ou Amsterdam ;
  • Mat√©riel fourni en accord avec tes missions et nos engagements soci√©taux (Mac, Windows, ou Chromebooks) ;
  • Une √©quipe de projet locale au sein d'un r√©seau mondial (possibilit√© de carri√®re internationale) ;
  • D√©veloppement des comp√©tences et accompagnement (diversit√© des projets, certifications techniques d√®s la premi√®re ann√©e, formations internes et externes, etc.) ;
  • Package de r√©mun√©ration (participation des employ√©s aux actions de l'entreprise, bonus mensuels/trimestriels).

DECATHLON DIGITAL

Imaginez si la technologie nous permettait de repousser les fronti√®res et d'offrir des exp√©riences sportives in√©dites. C'est pr√©cis√©ment notre ambition chez Decathlon Digital ! Nous sommes une √©quipe de plus de 5 000 experts en ing√©nierie logicielle, gestion de produits, donn√©es, cloud et cybers√©curit√©, r√©partis √† Paris, Lille et Amsterdam. Ensemble, nous cr√©ons la plus vaste plateforme sportive num√©rique, en exploitant les innovations technologiques pour optimiser la cha√Æne de valeur, concevoir des exp√©riences connect√©es et donner une seconde vie √† nos produits.

Changeons la donne pour de bon. Notre passion du sport nous guide et nous voulons qu‚Äôelle perdure. C‚Äôest pourquoi nous nous engageons √† b√¢tir un mod√®le technologique plus durable, en r√©duisant notre impact direct sur l'environnement, et en cr√©ant un espace s√ªr et inclusif pour apprendre et nous √©panouir ensemble. Rejoins l‚Äô√©quipe et fa√ßonnons le futur du sport.
column36: Mobile Apps, Software, Cyber Security, Sports, E-commerce, Mass Distribution
column38:

With the expertise of over 4 000 teammates based in Lille, Paris, and Amsterdam, committed to creating the largest digital sports platform, leveraging tech innovation from design to value chain optimization, connected experiences, and product second life.

At DECATHLON DIGITAL, we‚Äôre transforming global digital sports experiences to elevate how customers and employees sustainably play, train, and connect in more than 70 countries.

column13: Senior BW Data Engineer - SAP Analytics (f/m/d)
column15:
REJOINS L'√âQUIPE VALUE CHAIN BI SAP ANALYTICS

√Ä mi-chemin entre la DATA et la VALUE CHAIN, l'√©quipe SAP Analytics est charg√©e de mettre √† disposition l'ensemble des donn√©es n√©cessaires √† la VALUE CHAIN permettant une prise de d√©cision rapide et √©clair√©e.

Le p√©rim√®tre fonctionnel, allant de la production (usines) jusqu‚Äô√† la livraison des articles aux magasins/sites e-commerce, est immense et sert plusieurs milliers d‚Äôutilisateurs internes.

√Ä la r√©ception de donn√©es venant donc de plusieurs environnements (SAP, Data, ou diff√©rents syst√®mes op√©rationnels), les interactions avec les autres domaines sont nombreuses et riches d‚Äôapprentissages.

De notre c√¥t√©, nous sommes responsables de plusieurs outils : BW pour le stockage des donn√©es (Data Warehouse), Analysis For Office (AFO) et SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC) pour la restitution √† nos utilisateurs (Business Intelligence), SAP BI-IP et SAC Planning pour la planification et la simulation (Planning). Ces outils sont critiques pour nos utilisateurs car ils les utilisent au quotidien pour suivre leurs activit√©s, se piloter, et prioriser leurs actions.

L'√©quipe actuelle, compos√©e de 12 personnes, est jeune, motiv√©e, multiculturelle et multi-sites (France, Chine, Inde, Roumanie, Canada).

Dans le cadre de l‚Äôouverture d‚Äôun poste en interne, nous recrutons un-e Senior Data Engineer / D√©veloppeur BW, bas√©-e, √† Lille (Croix).

Contexte & Mission

Dans le cadre de l'√©volution de la BI pour la Supply Decathlon, nous continuons d‚Äôalimenter notre Data Warehouse de nouvelles donn√©es pour r√©pondre toujours davantage aux besoins de nos utilisateurs.

Pour cela, nous avons une √©quipe de d√©veloppement sp√©cialis√©e en BW 7.5.

Dans l'optique du renforcement de l'√©quipe, nous recherchons un d√©veloppeur ayant une exp√©rience significative dans le d√©veloppement et id√©alement avec des connaissances du monde SAP ou du Data Warehousing.

Int√©gr√© √† une √©quipe de d√©veloppement, tu auras pour mission :

De d√©velopper:

  • R√©diger des sp√©cifications techniques
  • Mod√©liser des flux BW (Datasources, Infopackages, ABAP/AMDP Transformations, DTPs, Infosources, aDSOs, Composite Providers)
  • D√©velopper de vues Hana (via Hana studio)
  • D√©velopper des queries BW, workbooks AFO pour la restitution aux utilisateurs
  • Optimiser les performances
  • D√©velopper dans le respect des bonnes pratiques
  • R√©aliser les tests unitaires
  • Challenger des choix techniques r√©alis√©s par les autres d√©veloppeurs

D‚Äôanimer des sujets organisationnels ou techniques au sein de l‚Äô√©quipe, comme par exemple:

  • Responsable du process agile
  • Responsabilit√© des environnements de d√©veloppement / test
  • Documentation
  • Standardisation

De collaborer avec les m√©tiers ci-dessous dans un environnement agile:

  • D‚Äôautres d√©veloppeurs (BW, SAP, BI, ‚Ä¶)
  • Des PM
  • Le Support
  • Des utilisateurs cl√©s et supports m√©tiers

Comp√©tences

  • A minima 5 ans d‚Äôexp√©rience dans le d√©veloppement avec un r√¥le organisationnel (ou la forte volont√© de le travailler)
  • Connaissance de la m√©thodologie agile
  • Technologies bonus: SAP BW / SAP HANA / SAP BI-IP / SAP BPC / SAC / SAC Planning

Savoir-Etre

  • Organis√© et sachant travailler en √©quipe
  • Bonne communication
  • Capacit√© √† jongler entre le court terme (livraison de d√©veloppements) et le long terme (organisation, structuration, ‚Ä¶)

Ce que nous offrons

  • 2 jours de t√©l√©travail par semaine ;
  • Possibilit√© de travailler dans l'un des bureaux de Decathlon Digital √† Lille, Paris ou Amsterdam ;
  • Mat√©riel fourni en accord avec tes missions et nos engagements soci√©taux (Mac, Windows, ou Chromebooks) ;
  • Une √©quipe de projet locale au sein d'un r√©seau mondial (possibilit√© de carri√®re internationale) ;
  • D√©veloppement des comp√©tences et accompagnement (diversit√© des projets, certifications techniques d√®s la premi√®re ann√©e, formations internes et externes, etc.) ;
  • Package de r√©mun√©ration (participation des employ√©s aux actions de l'entreprise, bonus mensuels/trimestriels).

DECATHLON DIGITAL

Imaginez si la technologie nous permettait de repousser les fronti√®res et d'offrir des exp√©riences sportives in√©dites. C'est pr√©cis√©ment notre ambition chez Decathlon Digital ! Nous sommes une √©quipe de plus de 5 000 experts en ing√©nierie logicielle, gestion de produits, donn√©es, cloud et cybers√©curit√©, r√©partis √† Paris, Lille et Amsterdam. Ensemble, nous cr√©ons la plus vaste plateforme sportive num√©rique, en exploitant les innovations technologiques pour optimiser la cha√Æne de valeur, concevoir des exp√©riences connect√©es et donner une seconde vie √† nos produits.

Changeons la donne pour de bon. Notre passion du sport nous guide et nous voulons qu‚Äôelle perdure. C‚Äôest pourquoi nous nous engageons √† b√¢tir un mod√®le technologique plus durable, en r√©duisant notre impact direct sur l'environnement, et en cr√©ant un espace s√ªr et inclusif pour apprendre et nous √©panouir ensemble. Rejoins l‚Äô√©quipe et fa√ßonnons le futur du sport.

column13: Manager in Marketing Analytics & Data Science - New York & Los Angeles
column15:
Ekimetrics¬†is a leader in data science and AI-powered solutions. For over 16 years, we‚Äôve pioneered the use of AI and advanced data science applied to unified marketing measurement, holistic business optimization and broad-ranging sustainability goals.

Our goal: combine high impact with long-term business purpose.

Ekimetrics is one of the world‚Äôs largest independent analytics firms with offices on 3 continents, and with more than 400 data experts. Since 2006, we have led more than a thousand data science projects in over 50 countries, generating more than¬†$1bn in profit for our customers.

We help companies rethink the way they operate, so they can¬†reconcile financial KPIs¬†with¬†non-financial goals. We are uniquely specialized in creating scalable data and analytics solutions that drive high-impact optimizations in alignment with overarching brand strategy and sustainability goals.

At Ekimetrics, we believe our best assets are our people. They are what set us apart and drive our success with entrepreneurial spirit and innovation. We encourage entrepreneurial spirit and innovation. We share what we know with others, and, above all, we love what we do. These sentiments are supported by our company values which serve as pillars in our work and attitude: curiosity, creativity, excellence, transmission, and pleasure.¬†

Context:

To sustain our quick growth, we are seeking a Manager to join our team in New York.

The successful candidate will show both analytic skills and strong interest for marketing & business strategy.

The Manager plays a key role in Ekimetrics organization. They will be contributing to the growth and health of the company, including providing thorough leadership by closely working with the Ekimetrics Management team.

The ideal candidate will focus on delivering analytics projects that will lead to significant, value-led transformation for our clients. This requires building strong client relationships by understanding their needs and offering the right solutions.

Job Responsibilities:

* Client facing

Ownership on the client relationship of the managed accounts. Promote a confidence and proximity relationship with blue chip clients at EXEC Level

Ensure the day-to-day operational management of key accounts and coordinate several projects simultaneously.

Cultivating your external network with a client centric approach

* Data Science and Modeling

Responsible for the production of statistics and econometrics modeling

Ensure the respect of Ekimetrics standards of Excellence on the strategic recommendations delivered

Ability to manage data scientists

*Business Acumen

Lead strategic consulting missions for key clients around the company portfolio. The ideal candidate will bring real value into our projects by helping top management to define marketing & business strategic direction and implement changes needed to achieve sustainable performance improvement.

Broad client relationships at VP level in order to achieve new business opportunities.

* Team management/People developer

Recruit and align resources to hire, develop staff, manage performance, and create/enhance data scientists at all levels.

Actively work with the team to improve team‚Äôs engagement, retain top performers and support the development of future leaders at Ekimetrics

* Company development

Managers at Ekimetrics are strongly involved in the company‚Äôs development initiatives. The successful candidate will be involved in strategic decisions and be a strong representative of Ekimetric‚Äôs Culture.

Bring leadership insight specific to Industry or functional analytics and continue to build Ekimetrics‚Äô reputation and brand.

Candidate profile

* The successful candidate will possess both, a strong track record in analytics & modelling and capacity to conduct business & strategy assignments in order to create value and innovative customer engagements.

* The key management consulting skills and experiences will include:

* Experience at a consulting firm or other relevant service provider or providing leadership within a highly regarded global corporation with a strong reputation for analytics.

* Strong ability to develop new and long lasting client relationships at senior levels (including business leaders) within the sector and a focus on complex analytic issues

* Team oriented and collaborative working style, both with clients and those within the organization.

* Capacity to develop high impact thought leadership that articulates a forward thinking view of the market.

* Demonstrated ability to develop younger talent and build a high performing team.

What we offer:

At Ekimetrics, final base salary is determined by a multitude of factors and vary from candidate to candidate. Determining factors for base compensation include, but are not limited to, professional background, years of experience, and skillset. A reasonable estimate of the base salary for our NYC office is $140,000. In addition to this base salary range, we have a comprehensive benefits package, generous bonus package, and a dynamic promotions and salary raise structure.

- Medical insurance, dental and vision

-¬†An emphasis on work-life-balance and generous PTO

-¬†Dynamic environment with a strong culture and great offices

-¬†Close-knit team with friendly environment, bi-monthly team events and more

-¬†Creative and entrepreneurial start-up environment with vertical mobility

-¬†Best-in-class methodologies and cutting edge technologies

-¬†Unique training package with 70+ sessions

-¬†Growth to develop a double profile in data science and strategic consulting

-¬†Client exposure up to the executive level

-¬†Opportunities for international mobility

Ekimetrics is an equal opportunity employer committed to making all employment decisions without regard to race/ethnicity, gender, pregnancy, gender identity or expression, color, creed, religion, national origin, age, disability, marital status (including domestic partnerships and civil unions), sexual orientation, military veteran status, unemployment status, or other legally protected categories, subject to applicable law.

Please note that we do not offer visa sponsorship or transfer for this position.

column13: Data Science & Analytics Manager - Customer Growth (f/m/d)
column15:
Notre √©quipe Customer Growth cherche un(e) Data Science & Analytics Manager bas√©(e) √† Paris ou Amsterdam !

Au c≈ìur de la transformation digitale de Decathlon, notre √©quipe Customer Growth vise √† devenir une r√©f√©rence dans la cr√©ation d'exp√©riences client personnalis√©es. Pour conduire ce changement au sein de l'organisation, nous travaillons selon le principe 4-in-Box, avec le Business Representative, le Produit, l'Ing√©nierie et les Donn√©es travaillant collectivement.

  • Garantir la visibilit√© et la cr√©ation de valeur des projets men√©s, influencer les √©quipes business pour adopter les bonnes m√©triques et strat√©gies, et cr√©er un climat de confiance avec toutes les parties prenantes.
